loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
El señor Santiago es un mecánico de motos y carros muy experimentado. Ha adquirido muchas habilidades a través de pequeños estudios en diferentes academias y otra parte la ha aprendido empíricamente.

Adicional a su labor como mecánico también tiene un pequeño almacén de venta de repuestos automotrices en el cual ofrece distintos tipos de repuestos en diferentes marcas.

Es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado que conoce el significado que tienen los automóviles para sus dueños y es por esto que siempre trata de ofrecer un excelente servicio, de buena calidad y de una manera eficiente.

El solicita un préstamo para surtir su almacén con gran cantidad de repuestos, de este modo podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes
texts.en:
Santiago is an experienced motorcycle and car mechanic. He has acquired many abilities through his studies in different academies and empirically on the job. In addition to his work as a mechanic he has a small auto parts store where he offers various brands of auto parts. He is a very hard-working and honorable man who knows the significance that automobiles have to their owners and that is why he always tries to offer excellent service, of good quality, and efficiently.

He seeks a loan to stock his store with a large quantity of parts so he will be able to have products available for his customers.

loans.use: to stock his store with a large quantity of parts so he will be able to have products available for his customers.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia continúa con su negocio de venta de edredones y frazadas. El crédito que obtuvo lo empleó para comprar ropa de cama para abastecer su negocio, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque tuvo buenas ventas. Actualmente su negocio funciona de buena manera, las ferias que visita son muy comerciales y puede vender sin inconvenientes, “sigo trabajando de la misma manera y las ventas van bien…” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que puede llevar su mercadería a diferentes ferias, la desventaja es no contar con un puesto fijo de venta. Su sueño es tener un puesto fijo de venta en la feria, ella desea comprar frazadas por mayor. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que realiza esta actividad de forma independiente. 
Es por esos motivos que Delia solicita un préstamo para comprar frazadas por mayor para vender ambulantemente.
texts.en:
Delia continues with her quilt and blanket sales business. She used her loan to purchase bed linens to stock her business, and she made her payments punctually because she had good sales.

Currently, her business is doing well; the markets that she visits are very commercial, and she is able to sell without any problems. "I keep working in the same way and sales are going well...", she says.

The advantage of her business is that she can take her merchandise to different markets, and the disadvantage is not having a permanent sales stall. Her dream is to have a permanent sales stall in the market.

She wants to purchase blankets at wholesale. This is the second loan cycle with the institution in the three years that she has been carrying out this activity independently. Delia is requesting a loan to purchase blankets at wholesale to sell on foot.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale blankets to sell on foot.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es:
Maria es una campesina de 53 años de edad, nacida en el seno de una familia humilde que siempre se dedicó a las actividades del campo y, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres, hoy en día ella se dedica a la cría y comercialización de cerdos, actividad con la que genera ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y para brindar sustento a sus 5 hijos. 
Su espíritu de superación, la tenacidad y la fortaleza con la que se levanta día a día, la impulsan para buscar nuevas opciones que le permitan salir adelante, por ello solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar lechones y concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le permitirá aumentar su producción para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa con la temporada de navidad que se aproxima, dando como resultado la obtención de mejores ingresos para continuar solventando algunas necesidades familiares y, seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, que se ha convertido en la principal fuente de recursos económicos para la familia. 

Maria desea seguir luchando con empeño, dedicación y esfuerzo, para llegar a cumplir el sueño de adquirir más cerdos y tener una producción escalonada, que le garantice la entrada de utilidades constantemente y pueda brindar a sus hijos una mejor educación y bienestar.
texts.en:
Maria is a 53 year old farmer. She was born into the heart of a humble family that always worked in the fields. Thanks to the teachings of her parents, today she works breeding and selling pigs, a job from which she generates income to support her husband with the economic burden of the home, and provides support to their 5 children.

Her spirit to excel, her tenacity, and the strength with which she arises day after day, motivated her to seek new options that would allow her to get ahead. For that reason she seeks a loan with which she wants to buy piglets and concentrated feed for the animals. This will allow her to increase her production to satisfy the demand that grows in the approaching Christmas season. As a result she will obtain increased income to continue meeting some of the household expenses and can continue investing in her business which has become the primary source of economic resources for the family. Maria wants to continue fighting with determination, dedication and effort, to fulfill her dream of acquiring more pigs and to have a staggered production, which will guarantee a constant stream of income so that she can provide her children a better education and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy pigs in order to have a staggered production.

loans.name: Pablo Emilio

texts.es:
Pablo, un padre de 41 años de edad con 5 hijos a su cuidado, es cabeza de hogar y ha podido sostener a su numerosa familia gracias a que trabaja como productora agropecuaria en su finca. 

Solicita un crédito para iniciar su propio negocio, una pequeña empresa que iniciaría con pollos los cuales criara y alimentara, la iniciativa la tomo básicamente por sus hijos porque quiere disfrutar con ellos de una mejor vida, que estudien y que todos los días tengan un motivo para sonreír. 

Apoya a este empresario que quiere demostrar que el papel de proveedor no le queda grande, solo necesita tu voto de confianza
texts.en:
Pablo is a 41 year old father of 5 children in his care. He is head of his household and has been able to support his large family thanks to his work as a farmer on his ranch. He seeks a loan to start his own business, a small business that he would begin with chickens to raise and feed, something he started primarily because of his children because he wants to them to enjoy a better life, to be able to study in school, and every day to have a reason to smile.

Support this entrepreneur who wishes to model his role as provider, he only needs your vote of confidence.

loans.use: to buy chickens to start his business.

loans.name: Luz Diana

texts.es:
Luz, a sus 27 años de edad es madre soltera de dos niños.  
Desde hace un tiempo, ella comenzó a laborar en el campo de la confección, pues le colaboraba a una Tía que tenía una empresa grande y allí se encargaba de pulir y revisar las prendas, cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad fue vinculada a la empresa, donde laboró por algunos años. 

Hace aproximadamente 3 años, Luz anca se independizó y montó su taller con gran empuje; afianzó su taller con la esperanza de que las ventas aumentaran y así fue, comenzó a conseguir contratos con terceros. De esta forma ha obtenido los ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 

Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar una máquina plana industrial, con el fin de brindarle a sus clientes una prenda bien elaborada y con excelente terminación, así aumentará los contratos y podrá generar mayores ingresos para poder cumplir el sueño de tener una línea propia, además de brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras  personas. 

Ella sabe que Interactuar es un gran apoyo para el crecimiento de su empresa!
texts.en:
At 27 years old, Luz is a single mother of two children.

A while ago, she started working in the garment-making field. She started by helping out an aunt who had a large business where she took on finalizing and checking garments. By the time she was an adult, she was established in the company, where she worked for some years.

About three years ago, Luz went out on her own and set up her own workshop with great energy. She established her workshop in hopes of her sales increasing, and they did. She started to get commercial contracts. In this way, she has earned the money to sustain her family.

With the loan that she is requesting, she would like to buy an industrial straight-stitch sewing machine, with the goal of providing her clients a well-made garment with excellent finishing. This way, her contracts will increase and she will be able to generate greater income in order to fulfill her dream of having her own clothing line, in addition to offering job opportunities to other people. She knows that Interactuar is a great source of support for her company's growth!

loans.use: to buy an industrial straight-stitch sewing machine, with the goal of providing her customers a well-made garment with excellent finishing.

loans.name: Lacides

texts.es:
Lacides tiene 44 años y vive en unión libre. Desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a las labores del campo, pues ha sido una tradición familiar y sus padres le enseñaron todo lo que hoy sabe. 

Actualmente posee cultivos en la finca donde reside, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en el mercado del pueblo, de esta manera ha obtenido los ingresos para apoyar al sustento a su familia. 

El cliente es un hombre pujante, trabajador y cada día lucha con esmero para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, especialmente los que afectan sus cultivos, como por ejemplo el clima cambiante y los altos costos de los insumos que requiere para cuidar sus siembras, sin embargo ha sabido salir adelante y seguir progresando. 

Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y semillas de café con lo que podrá seguir cuidando sus tierras y para que la cosecha sea más productiva, así aumentará sus ingresos y podrá brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica favorable.
texts.en:
Lacides is 44 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. Since he was little he has done farm work. It is a family tradition and his parents taught him everything he knows today.

He currently has crops on the farm where he lives, which are harvested and sold in the town market. This gives him income to support his family's basic needs.

Lacides is a thriving, hardworking man who works diligently every day to overcome the obstacles he faces; especially those affecting his crops, such as the changing climate and the high cost of supplies that he needs to care for them. Even so, he has managed to succeed and move forward.

He is currently requesting a loan in order to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers, and coffee seeds so that he can continue taking care of his land, and have a more productive harvest. In this way, he will be able to increase his income and provide his family with a better quality of life and economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers, and coffee seeds.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita, age 55, is married and has three adult children. Rosita’s husband is a carpenter. She helps her husband by selling food to the community of Tubigon, Bohol. She successfully started this business early this year. 

To continue with this business, Rosita is requesting a loan of 3,000 PHP to buy food ingredients, such as flour, cooking oil and sugar. She wishes business improvements in the future for sustainability.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients, such as flour, cooking oil and sugar.

loans.name: Ever Antonio

texts.es:
Ever es un hombre campesino de 44 años de edad que, se dedica a realizar todas las tareas del campo pues es propietario de un cultivo de café y uno de platano en el municipio de Andes; trabaja en estas actividades desde hace 10 años, día a día sin descanso, con el ánimo de generar recursos que le permitan aportar a la economía de su hogar. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar abonos agrícolas al por mayor y productos para el cuidado de la tierra como fertilizantes, fungicidas, pesticidas, entre otros, con lo que podrá aumentar la producción y mejorar los ingresos que percibe. 

Este apoyo para el significa aumentar su nivel de ventas, además tendrá la posibilidad de sacar una cosecha mucho más productiva gracias a los cuidados que le dará con los insumos agrícolas. 

Ever manifiesta su interés para darle continuidad a su labor, pues su sueño es poder ampliar y fortalecer aún más su negocio para que éste le genere mayor rentabilidad y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Ever is a 44 year old farmer who works performing all the tasks of a farm. He is the owner of a coffee farm and a banana farm in the town of Andes. He has worked in this business for 10 years, day after day without rest, with the motivation of generating resources that allow him to support the economy of his home.

He currently seeks the assistance of a loan to buy agricultural manure wholesale, and products to care for the land such as fertilizers, fungicides, and pesticides, among others, in order to increase his production and improve the earnings he receives. This support means an increase in the level of sales for him. In addition he'll have the possibility of obtaining a much more productive harvest, thanks to the care he will provide with the agricultural supplies. Ever exhibits an interest in providing continuity in his work. His dream is to be able to expand and strengthen his business even more, so that it generates greater profitability, thus improving the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to increase his level of sales.

loans.name: Sylvie

texts.fr:
A 30 ans, Sylvie est divorcée. Le couple a deux enfants dont l’un de 13 ans, vit avec elle. Son enfant  a échoué à son examen de BEPC(brevet d'étude) ne veut plus aller à l’école. Sylvie va prendre en charge les cours particuliers de celui-ci pour l’examen à la prochaine année scolaire.
L’épicerie gargote est une activité familiale créée depuis 2008. Les clients de l’épicerie sont les habitants du quartier, ceux de la gargote sont les employés des entreprises implantées dans la zone. Sylvie n’a pas cessé de chercher les moyens pour développer son activité, elle est actuellement à son troisième prêt. Il n'y a jamais eu de problème de remboursement. Le prêt sert à acheter diverses variétés de riz (riz de luxe, makalioka, stock, riz local), de l’huile, des légumes  et des œufs pour approvisionner l’activité d’épicerie gargote. Le facteur de succès de cette activité est d‘avoir un stock suffisant et diversifié de produits. 
Elle souhaite l’extension de l’activité. Elle prévoit de construire une maison à partir de l’épargne tirée de l’activité.
texts.en:
Sylvie, aged 30, is divorced. The couple have two children, of whom one is 13 years old. Her child who failed his BEPC exam (for a diploma) no longer wants to go to school. Sylvie will cover the cost of his individual courses for next year’s exam.

The diner & grocery store is a family business established in 2008. The store’s customers are the residents of the neighborhood, and the diner’s customers are employed at the enterprises set up in the area.

Sylvie keeps looking for ways to develop her business. She is currently on her 3rd loan. There was never any problem making payments. The loan will be used to purchase a diverse variety of rice (fancy, makalioka, stock, local), oil, vegetables, and eggs to supply her diner & grocery store. The success factor in this business is having an adequate inventory of diversified products.

Her wish is to expand her business. She plans to build a house through using the savings from her business earnings.

loans.use: to purchase rice (fancy and buffer stock), cooking oil, vegetables, meats.

loans.name: Kely Yohana

texts.es:
Kely es una mujer trabajadora de 38 años y madre de 5 hijos a los cuales día tras día intenta sostener con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Últimamente ha pensado en aumentar sus ingresos iniciando con una nueva actividad de forma paralela y piensa montar un negocio de venta de almuerzos y desayunos aprovechando el tránsito de trabajadores que hay en el sector.

Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de insumos como arroz, carne, verduras, entre otros con los cuales podrá dar inicio a este nuevo proyecto.

Kely pone muchas esperanzas en este negocio y confía en que con su gran capacidad de trabajo puede sacarlo adelante.
texts.en:
Kely is a 38 years old hard-working mother of 5 children who works day after day to sustain her grocery store business. Lately she has thought about expanding her income by starting a new business parallel to her existing one, starting to sell breakfasts and lunches, taking advantage of the transiting workers in the area.

For this reason she seeks a loan to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, vegetables, and other items with which she will be able to start this new project. Kely is putting many hopes into this business and is confident that with her great work capacity she can make it successful.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, vegetables, and other items with which she will be able to start this new project.

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha is 29 years old. She lives in Gaza strip with her small family. One year ago she started trading in chicken and birds. It’s a good business but still needs a lot of improvement. 

She applied for this youth loan to buy different kinds of birds, per customer requests, and cages and food for them, which will increase her income, helping her improve the financial conditions of her family. 

Rasha is very grateful to everyone who helps her achieve success in her business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of birds, per customer requests.

loans.name: Yonatan Mauricio

texts.es:
Yonatan es un joven muy emprendedor y creativo, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tener su propio negocio de cultivo de frijol en el municipio de Andes.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que él salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán sus estudios y el apoyo económico en su hogar.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar semillas de frijol, abonos, riegos, fertilizantes, entre otros elementos agropecuarios.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a un joven lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
Yonatan is an enterprising and creative young man. For some time he has wanted to support himself and have his own business growing beans in the Andes municipality. Today he can make his dream reality thanks to his great capacity to work and support he receives from Interactuar and the people who wish for his success in his business.

He will use his business to support his schooling and household expenses. He seeks a loan to buy beans to plant, manure, fertilizers, irrigation materials, and other farming supplies

With this loan you can support this young man fulfill his life and support his family!

loans.use: to buy beans to plant, manure, fertilizers, irrigation materials, and other farming supplies

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be active. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his tuk tuk (a motorcycle-based taxi). 

He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are loyal. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. 

He will use the 25,000 KES loan to service and maintain his tuk tuk. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to service and maintain his tuk tuk.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a married man. He describes himself to be reliable. He operates a retail business where he sells fruits and vegetables. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. 

He will use the 60,000 KES loan to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetables. His business goal is to open other business branches within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a stable business. This is his third loan with SMEP Micro-finance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to purchase additional stocks.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Marteniano

texts.en:
For the past 11 years, Marteniano has been engaged in fishing. He sells fresh fish to locals in his place. He is a 54-year-old married man with four grown children. He is an industrious man who is trying desperately to develop his business and seek ways to become productive.

He has requested a loan to purchase paint and plywood for motorboat renovation. This will help improve his yield and promotes safety as he sails in sea.
He is hoping that his fishing livelihood will become productive, which could help improve his family's present living situation.

In the future, Marteniano is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase paint and plywood for motorboat renovation.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en:
Winfred is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be a visionary. She operates a tailoring shop where she makes dresses and other clothes. She has been involved in this business for three years. 

Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be financial constraints. She will use the 60,000 KES loan to buy more stocks of tailoring materials. 

Her business goal is to open another shop within five years. She hopes that in the future she will have improved living standards. 

This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of tailoring materials.

loans.name: Flor De Belen

texts.en:
Flor de Belen is 34 years old and married with five children.

Flor de Belen is a hardworking woman who in looking to get her family ahead. She works selling men's and women's clothing in the market that is found close to her community. Through this business, she can obtain the necessary income to maintain the well-being of her family. Because she has administered this business for one year, the demand for her products has increased.

This is the reason that she is requesting a loan from GDPMC - to invest in blouses, pants, skirts, t-shirts, etc. in order to increase the sales and the earnings, and thus be able to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies for her business.

loans.name: Jhon Mario

texts.es:
Jhon es un campesino trabajador y humilde, con 45 años de edad, sigue trabajando para solventar los gastos básicos de su familia, conformada por su esposa y sus 2 hijos. 

Durante 10 años se ha dedicado a la cría y comercialización de cerdos y ganado de levante, actividad que aprendió por herencia familiar y que le ha permitido generar recursos para salir adelante.

Actualmente solicita un crédito con el que desea comprar un lote de cerdos y lograr tener una mejor producción que le permita generar mayor nivel de rentabilidad a la hora de vender.

Jhon manifiesta que los problemas no son impedimento para seguir realizando la labor que lo apasiona y que le ha dado de comer durante toda su vida, por ello sigue luchando incansablemente para lograr incrementar su ganado porcino y de levante y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y ofrecer a sus hijos menores la oportunidad de tener una educación de excelente calidad para que sean unos profesionales íntegros y exitosos.
texts.en:
Jhon is a hard-working, humble, 45 year old farmer. He continues working in order to support his family's basic needs. He and his wife have 2 children.

For 10 years he has worked raising and selling pigs and cattle, work he learned from his family and it has enabled him to generate resources to be successful. Today he seeks a loan to buy a group of pigs and be able to have a better production which will enable him to generate greater profits at the moment of sale.

Jhon maintains that problems are not an impediment as he continues to love this work and it has sustained him for his entire life. That is why he will continue fighting tirelessly in order to increase his profits with pigs and raise his family's quality of living and offer his children the opportunity to have an excellent education so that they may become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy a group of pigs and be able to have a better production.

loans.name: Maholy

texts.fr:
Maholy a 32 ans. Elle travaillait dans une entreprise franche de 2002 à 2005, depuis la fermeture de cette entreprise , elle n’a pas cessé de s’adonner à des activités de petit commerce pour les besoins financiers du ménage. Son mari est un agent de sécurité. Le couple est locataire et a 3 enfants : l’aîné de 11 ans est en classe de 5ème dans un établissement public, le second (9 ans) en classe de 7ème dans une école privée, le dernier (2 ans) est encore non scolarisé.
Maholy achète les sandales pour les revendre. Les articles offerts dépendent de la saison. Elle a exercé cette activité depuis 2006. Compte tenu du prix à l’approvisionnement, la vente de ses produits permet de tirer un bénéfice suffisant. Avec ses dix années d’expérience dans l’activité, elle connaît bien le marché. Elle vend aussi des friperies de toutes sortes.
L’objectif du couple est d’augmenter le fonds utilisé dans l’activité. Leur rêve est de pouvoir acquérir un terrain pour la construction d’un local et d’être autonome.
texts.en:
Maholy is 32 years old. She used to work at a free-zone enterprise from 2002 to 2005. Since this enterprise closed down, she continues to devote herself to small-scale commerce for the sake of the household budget. Her husband is a security guard. The couple are renting their housing and have three children: the oldest is 11 years old and a 7th grader in a public institution; the second child (aged 9) is a 5th grader in a private school; and the last child (aged 2) is not yet in school.

Maholy buys sandals to resell them. The items offered depend on the season. She has operated this business since 2006. Given the prices of supplies, the sale of her products enables her to make an adequate profit. With her ten years of business experience, she has known the market well. She also sells secondhand clothing of any sort.

The couple’s goal is to increase funding for the business. Their dream is to acquire a plot of land for building purposes and to be autonomous.

loans.use: to purchase sandals.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is a 35-year-old woman from Leyte, Philippines. She is married and is blessed with two sons; ages 14 and 6 years old. Her husband is a mechanic and works hard to make a better living.

Daisy helps her husband financially by running a hog-raising business. She successfully started this business earlier this year.

She is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets and feed as well. Daisy is still thinking of other business opportunities that will help augment their livelihood. As such, she is planning to buy rice for retail.

In the future, she wants to expand their hog-raising business.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed and expand into rice retailing.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru:
Хабиба та женщина, которая несмотря на все трудности смогла победит свой страх, перебороть отчаяние и нашла смысл жизни и свою цель в жизни. Муж Хабиби покинул ее с двумя детьми на руках. Она много бед и страданий натерпелась и пережила все. Ее жизнь начала складываться в лучшую сторону. Она открыла свой маленький магазин. Ее дети пошли в школу. У нее появились друзья. Ее детям 15 и 12 лет. Хабиба хочет? чтобы ее дети получили хорошее образование, те знания которые не смогла получить в свое время. 
Хабиба решила получить кредит для увеличения ассортимента товаров и этим способом привлечь новый клиентов. Она планирует увеличить доход и собирать денег на образования детей. Хабиба верит, что она сможет получить кредит.
texts.en:
Habiba is the kind of woman who, despite all difficulties, is able to battle her fears, overcome despair and find the meaning of life and her goals. Her husband left her with two young children in her arms. She has endured a great deal of misfortune and suffering and lived through it all. Her life has begun to change for the better, and she has opened her own small shop. Her children are 15 and 12 and are going to school and she has made friends. 

Habiba wants her children to receive a good education, a kind of learning that she was unable to achieve in her time. She has decided to take out a loan to increase her assortment of grocery products and in this way to attract new customers. She plans to increase her income and save money toward her children's education. She trusts that she will be able to receive a loan.

loans.use: to increase her assortment of food products

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice is a single woman with 1 child. She describes herself to be industrious. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 4 years.

Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low stock.

She will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to expand her business within 5 years.

She hopes that in the future, she will be a better business woman. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. All her previous loans were repaid successfully.

She will use the anticipated profits to take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
Guillermo es un joven con toda la energía y disposición para enfrentar el mundo y superarse.

Desea iniciar un negocio de venta de queso y leche, con este negocio podría obtener ingresos para poder aportar en su hogar.
Es un joven muy aplicado pues estudia y tiene deseos de salir adelante y ser profesional.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de una moto la cual utilizara para repartir las cargas y pedidos de queso.

Con este préstamo puede cumplir su sueño de ser independiente y darle a su madre todo lo que necesite, además de poder pagar sus estudios y progresar gracias al apoyo de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar.

Apoya el proyecto de un joven emprendedor Colombiano!
texts.en:
Guillermo is a young man with plenty of energy and the will to take on the world and better himself.

He would like to start a business selling cheese and milk. With this business, he would be able to obtain income in order to be able to contribute to his household.

He is a very determined young man; he is in school and has the desire to support himself and be a professional.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of a motorcycle, which he will use to deliver cargo and cheese orders.

With this loan, he can fulfill his dream of being independent and giving his mother everything she needs, in addition to being able to pay for his education and progressing thanks to the support of Kiva and the Interactuar Corporation.

Support this young Colombian entrepreneur's plan!

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle, which he will use to deliver cargo and cheese orders.

loans.name: Vonimboahirana Josée Fleuva

texts.fr:
Vonimboahirana a 27 ans, elle est mariée. Son mari vend des téléphones dans le même lieu. Le couple a deux enfants (8-5 ans) dont un scolarisé. Le couple vit dans une maison construite sur un terrain loué, il prévoit de constituer une épargne pour l’acquisition d’un terrain et d’y construire leur propre maison.
Elle achète des articles vestimentaires pour les revendre dans un lieu localisé en plein centre ville. Elle a commencé en 2000 par la vente de pantalons, elle est à son quatrième prêt pour diversifier les articles à vendre. Le marché est loin d’être saturé. Avant, elle s’adonnait à la vente de nem.
Le prêt sert à acheter  des pantalons de grande et de petite taille, des pullover et des shorts confectionnés. La réussite de l’activité dépend de la quantité et de la qualité des articles offerts.
texts.en:
Vonimboahirana is 27 years old and married. Her husband sells telephones at the same place. The couple have two children (aged 8 and 5), of whom one is in school. The couple live in a house built on leased land. They plans to establish some savings to acquire land on which to build a house of their own.

Vonimboahirana buys clothing-related items to resell at a spot located in the middle of downtown. She began in 2000 by selling pants. She is now on her 4th loan for diversifying the articles sold. The market is far from being saturated. Before, she used to devote all her time to selling “nem” [spring rolls or egg rolls].

The loan will be used to purchase pants of large and small sizes; sweaters; and commercially produced shorts. The success of her business depends on the quantity and quality of her articles offered.

loans.use: to purchase pants and shorts

loans.name: Miriam De Jesús

texts.es:
Miriam es una mujer trabajadora y tenaza; desde hace aproximadamente 5 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como ropa, perfumería, cremas corporales, accesorios, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor como blusas, jeans, zapatos, accesorios, perfumería, entre otros, así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada de fin de año; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Miriam, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un gran local comercial donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable.
texts.en:
Miriam is a hard-working and tenacious woman. Approximately 5 years ago she decided to start working as an independent merchant, a job that she learned from experience and which came from the need to get an income to support her family. She offers all types of products such as clothing, perfume, body lotions, accessories, and others. She counts on the advantage of meeting new people every day who she can offer her merchandise to, improving her sales every day.

Currently she is asking for loan support to buy wholesale merchandise such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, perfume and others. This way she will be able to stock up with more variety to satisfy the demand that increases during this end-of-the-year season, improving her income level.

With determination and dedication, Miriam wants to keep working to support her business, because in the near future she dreams of having the possibility to set up a store in a big commercial space, where she could offer a larger variety of articles to generate a profit and a favorable economic stability.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise such as blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, perfume and others.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 22 years old. She is the fourth born in a family of five, with the youngest currently in secondary school. Sarah’s dream is to run her own business, but the lack of capital is a huge obstacle in making this dream a reality.

She is requesting a Kiva loan in order to purchase a branded trading trolley and a mobile phone so that she can have the equipment and funds needed to start running her own business.

Sarah would like to run a mobile money transfer business in Blantyre and use the revenue generated to support her siblings and give back to her community by creating employment opportunities.

Zoona has done the market research and in so doing has found that, with Blantyre being the second largest city in Malawi, the location in which Sarah is looking to open her outlet would be ideal not only for employment opportunities for that community, but also to generate the traction she envisions for her business.

Sarah thanks the Kiva lenders for their support in her endeavour.

loans.use: to buy the needed equipment to start her own business.

loans.name: Lala

texts.fr:
Lala a 42 ans, elle est mariée. Le conjoint est un chauffeur de taxi bus. Leurs enfants (21-5 ans)  sont  scolarisés. Elle confectionne elle-même les vêtements qu’elle vend sur le marché de la capitale. Les précédents prêts au nombre de six  ont été investis dans l’activité dans l’acquisition de matériels et de matières premières. C’est sa principale source de revenu. Elle veut être autonome en développant l’activité. C’est une activité dont le marché est loin d’être saturé, les revenus dépendent aussi du nombre de produits confectionnés car c’est une activité à faible marge. La rentabilité de l’activité dépend de la qualité des matières premières utilisées pour répondre aux besoins des clients.
Le couple ne paie pas de loyer, il habite dans une maison appartenant à ses parents. Leur objectif est de toujours procéder à l’extension de l’activité.
texts.en:
Lala is 42 years old and married. The husband is a taxi bus driver. Their children (aged 5 to 21) are in school. Lala herself makes clothing which she sells on the market in the capital city. The previous six loans have been invested in the business by acquiring supplies and basic materials. This is her main source of income.

Lala wants to be autonomous by developing the business, which is in a market that is far from saturation. Her income also depends on the number of products made, since profit margins are low in this business. The business’s profitability depends on the quality of the basic materials employed for responding to customer needs.

The couple do not pay rent. They live in a parents’ house. Their goal is still to proceed with expanding the business.

loans.use: to purchase sewing thread, ribbons, elastics, labels, and paints.

loans.name: Sindy Marcela

texts.es:
Sindy en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decide comprar un negocio que según ella le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Comprará un negocio de tienda de abarrotes en el municipio de Valparaiso en el cual trabaja como empleada, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por sus dos hijos y su esposo.

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar todos los derechos sobre el negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de una Colombiana con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Sindy, in her search for a promising future and some good opportunities to get ahead, has decided to buy a business that, according to her, will give her all that she has ever dreamed of. She will buy a grocery store business in the town of Valparaiso where she works as an employee, and with which she plans to support her family composed of her two children and her husband.

Her main difficulty is the lack of money to work. To achieve this, she needs the help of a loan through the Interactuar Corporation that allows her to buy all of the rights to the business.

Support the entrepreneurial dreams of a Colombian woman with a loan today!

loans.use: to buy basic family needs to improve and vary her products, looking to attract more customers.

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is an amazing lady who lives in Nablus City. She is working hard to ensure a good life for her father and mother and ensure that they do not need anything.

Aysha father is unable to work. She wants to help him in anyway she can and because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she decided to open her own business.

She started a sewing business one year ago. She has had a good experience in this business and has decided to expand. Therefore, she applied for a loan to help her buy a new sewing machine and yarns and fabrics to increase her income.

She needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine and yarns and fabrics to increase her income.

loans.name: Yuledis Maria

texts.es:
Yuledis es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante a su hijo brindándole una educación de buena calidad.

Yuledis vive en unión libre con su pareja y desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a vender calzado y ropa, con gran esfuerzo ha superado muchos problemas que se le han presentado.

Actualmente Yuledis tiene unos muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes y debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital busca un préstamo para abastecerse con gran cantidad de ropa, accesorios, calzado, entre otros.
Le dedica 5 horas diarias a su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es salir adelante con su negocio y desde este poder ofrecerles a su hijo una buena calidad de vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, sabe que de la mano de Interactuar podrá lograrlo.
texts.en:
Yuledis is a very hard-working person who, thanks to her daily efforts has managed to get her child ahead, offering him a good quality education.

Yuledis lives in a common-law marriage with her partner and a long time ago, she began to sell shoes and clothing. With a great effort, she has overcome many problems that have come up.

Currently, Yuledis has some very good orders from her customers and due to not having a lot of capital, she is looking for a loan to stock up on a large quantity of clothing, accessories, shoes, and more.

She works at her business 5 hours daily.

Her greatest dream is to get ahead with her business and from there be able to offer her child a good quality of life and more economic stability. She knows that with the hand of Interactuar, she will be able to achieve it.

loans.use: to stock her business with clothing, accessories and shoes in large quantities.

loans.name: Dorian Marbelly

texts.es:
Dorian, a sus 39 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y pujante; pues siempre va en busca de alternativas que le permitan progresar. 

Desde hace 3 años se dedica a trabajar en el campo de la confección, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco fue perfeccionando su técnica y ampliando sus conocimientos por medio de la práctica, esto la impulsó para iniciar su propio taller, para lo cual adecuó un espacio en su casa y con unos ahorros que tenía compró sus primeras máquinas. 

Trabaja sola todos los días durante 12 horas, pero en ocasiones recibe el apoyo de una persona, dependiendo de la cantidad de trabajo que tenga; así ha logrado generar los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos del hogar. 

El crédito que solicita en apoyo con la Corporación Interactuar es para el fortalecimiento de su labor, pues con el dinero comprará una máquina plana, con la que podrá agilizar el proceso de producción y adquirir más contratos, generando mayor rentabilidad en el negocio. 

Dorian manifiesta que su mayor desafío es el alto costo de los insumos para trabajar, sin embargo esto la sigue motivando para seguir prestando un mejor servicio y luchar para que el sueño de la acreditación de su negocio se haga realidad y le permita generar oportunidades de empleo, así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de las personas que influyan en la labor.
texts.en:
Dorian, 39 years old, is a hard-working and thriving woman, since she always seeks out alternatives that allow her to progress.

For 3 years, she has worked in the field of sewing, a trade she learned on her own and little by little perfected her technique and expanded her knowledge through practice. This motivated her to open her own shop, so she outfitted a space in her house and, with some savings that she had, she purchased her first machines.

She works alone every day for 12 hours but sometimes she gets the support of one person, depending on the quantity of work that she has. In this way she has managed to generate sufficient resources to cover the household expenses.

The loan that she is asking for with the support of Corporación Interactuar is to strengthen her work, since with the money she will purchase a sewing machine, with that she will be able to speed up the production process and get more contracts, generating more profitability in the business.

Dorian says that her greatest challenge is the high costs of the working supplies, however this keeps her motivated to continue offering a better service and struggling so that the dream of registering her business comes true and allows her to generate employment opportunities, and in this way she will improve her quality of life and that of the people who are influenced by the work.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for her shop.

loans.name: Antonio Del Cristo

texts.es:
Con su gran manera de trabajar, su amor por sus hijos, su convicción de salir adelante y la fe que tiene en sus sueños, Antonio ha tenido la fortaleza para trabajar en su finca con la cría de carneros.

Esta es una actividad que le ha dado muchas oportunidades y que le ha permitido darle un sustento digno a su familia.

Hoy en día su negocio necesita un gran impulso económico, es por ello que solicita un préstamo para comprar un lote de carneros, los cuales criara y podrá vender posteriormente a un buen precio.

Confía mucho en los prestadores de kiva y en el apoyo de Interactuar para lograr consolidar su negocio.
texts.en:
With a great way of working, his love for his children, his conviction in getting ahead and the faith that he has in his dreams, Antonio has had the strength to work his farm raising sheep.

This is work that has given him many opportunities and has allowed him to provide a dignified sustenance to his family.

These days, his business needs a big economic boost, so he is asking for a loan to purchase a batch of lambs, which he will raise and will be able to later sell at a good price.

He has a lot of trust in the Kiva lenders and the support of Interactuar to manage to strengthen his business.

loans.use: to purchase a batch of lambs, which he will raise and will be able to later sell at a good price.

loans.name: Nini Jhoana

texts.es:
Nini, a sus 31 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es madre de 4hijos.
Actualmente se encuentra dedicada, a la cría y comercialización de cerdos, pues tiene el espacio disponible en una pequeña finca y aprovecha que posee conocimientos en la labor gracias a su familia que toda la vida se ha dedicado a las labores agropecuarias. 

Su perseverancia, empeño y las ganas de salir adelante, la motivan para solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que comprará más lechones para cría y engorde, de esta manera podrá continuar con su proyecto productivo con el que espera obtener buenos resultados, especialmente en la temporada de fin de año, en el que aumenta el consumo de esta carne, lo que para el significa generar más ingresos económicos. 

Nini desea luchar arduamente para sacar su proyecto adelante y en un futuro sueña con pagar la educación de sus hijos, tener un negocio sostenible con diversidad de productos para ofrecer al mercado y poder garantizar un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Nini is 31-years old, in a common-law marriage and the mother of 4 children. Currently she works raising and selling pigs because she has the available space on a small farm, and she takes advantage of the fact that she has knowledge in this field thanks to her family who has always worked in agriculture.

Her perseverance, determination, and the desire to get ahead motivate her to ask for loan support with which she will buy more piglets to raise and fatten. This way she will be able to continue with her productive project with which she hopes to get good results, especially in the end-of-the-year season where she increases the consumption of meat which means getting more income.

Nini wants to fight hard to support her project. In the future she dreams of paying for her children's education, having a sustainable business with product diversity to offer to the market, and being able to guarantee a better well-being and quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and fatten, in order to continue with her productive project and look to get a better income.

loans.name: Meline

texts.fr:
Méline a 40 ans, elle est mariée, le conjoint  travaille comme soudeur. Le couple a 3 enfants : deux enfants jumeaux  de 18 ans dont l’un travaille et l’autre est encore étudiant et le dernier (6 ans) scolarisé dans une école privée. 
Méline a 8 années d’expérience dans l’activité de gestion de magasin général. Elle connaît bien les besoins de ses clients. Elle n’a pas cessé d’augmenter le stock et de diversifier les produits offerts par l’unité pour le développement de l’activité par les prêts qu’elle a obtenu. Elle est avec CEFOR depuis pas mal d'années, une grande confiance est déjà établie entre elle et l’institution de micro finance.
Le ménage vit dans une maison louée depuis 8 années, leur objectif est de procéder à l’extension de l’activité, le rêve étant de construire un local afin d’éviter de payer de loyer.
texts.en:
Méline, aged 40, is married. The husband works as a welder. The couple have three children: two are twins, aged 18, of whom one is working while the other is still a student. The last child (aged 6) is a student in a private school.

Méline has eight years of experience in the business of managing a general store. She knows well what her customers need. She keeps increasing her inventory and diversifying the products offered in order to develop the business through loans she has gotten. She has been with CEFOR for quite a number of years. A great deal of trust has already been established between her and the microfinance institution.

The members of the family live in a house rented for the last eight years. Their goal is to proceed with expanding the business, the dream being to build a place to avoid paying rent.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice and sugar, containers of cooking oil, boxes of soaps, and a few liters of kerosene.

loans.name: Diego Fernando

texts.es:
Diego, de 21 años, inicio con un negocio de fotografía hace aproximadamente 5 años con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir.

En el momento, encuentra su motivación para trabajar incansablemente en sus padres y es así como desea ofrecerles lo mejor para su vida.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una cámara de fotografía profesional para mejorar su servicio y la calidad de sus trabajos.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener su negocio y podrá aportar económicamente en su hogar.

Apoya a Diego para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Diego, 21 years old, began his own photography business approximately 5 years ago with the desire to seek work that would generate the income to be able to survive.

At the moment, he finds his motivation to work tirelessly in his parents, and this is how he wants to offer them the best for their life.

He asks for a loan to purchase a professional camera to improve his service and the quality of his work.

With this loan, he will be able to sustain his business and will be able to contribute economically to his household.

Support Diego so that he can continue with his business!

loans.use: to purchase a professional camera to improve his service and the quality of his work.

loans.name: Gilberto Manuel

texts.es:
Gilberto, en su humilde hogar, intenta ganarse la vida con la venta de carne. Con este producto intenta salir adelante día a día.
Vive con su esposa y dos de sus tres hijos en su casa el cual apoya con el sostenimiento.

Con esta actividad ha sobrevivido durante algún tiempo, y a pesar de los pocos ingresos y lo difícil de su vida, nunca deja su alegría y sonrisa.

Solicita un apoyo económico para realizar la compra de cerdos para vender su carne.

Este préstamo le dará la oportunidad de abastecerse y tener su negocio un poco más consolidado.
texts.en:
Gilberto, in his humble home, tries to make a living selling meat. With this product he tries to get ahead, day by day. He lives with his wife and two of their three children in his house, which helps with the expenses. With this job he has survived for some time, and in spite of scarce resources and the difficulty of his life, he never loses his joy or his smile.

He seeks economic support to be able to buy pigs in order to sell their meat. This loan will give him the opportunity to stock up and make his business a bit more well-established.

loans.use: to buy pigs, process them, and later sell the meat at the butchers.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es:
Sebastian es un joven muy trabajador y con un gran corazón campesino que ha sido fortalecido con la humildad y la sensatez que distingue a los habitantes del municipio de Marinilla.

Vive en una finca con sus padres, quienes han sido su más grande apoyo y maestros de la vida. Aprendió de la agricultura a través de su padre y  empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras 
personas. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas de frijol, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Sebastian sueña con tener una mejor vivienda en un futuro y tener un negocio que sea sostenible.

 ¡Impacte la vida de Sebastian y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Sebastian is a very hardworking young farmer with a big heart that has been strengthened by the humility and good sense that distinguishes the residents of the municipality of Marinilla.

He lives on a farm with his parents, who have been his greatest supporters and teachers in life. He learned about agriculture from his father and through his own experiences and observations of others.

He plans to use his loan to buy farming supplies such as bean seed, disease control products, and fertilizers, to maintain and sustain his crops. Thanks to this loan, his family's finances and quality of life will improve, since he will be able to increase his income.

Sebastian dreams of having a better home in the future and having a sustainable business.

Make an impact on the lives of Sebastian and his family with a loan!

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as bean seed, disease control products, and fertilizers, to maintain and sustain his crops.

loans.name: Yimis Miguel

texts.es:
Con muchas ganas de salir adelante y con mucho empuje, Yimis se enfoca en poder montar un negocio de fabricación de bloques de concreto y baldosas para construir pisos.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar cemento, arena y una maquina mezcladora con la que podrá fabricar estos elementos.

Vive con su esposa y es padre de un hijo de 8 años por el cual lucha día a día para darle una buena educación y poder formarle un buen futuro.
texts.en:
With a great desire to support himself and with great energy, Yimis is focused on being able to start a business fabricating concrete blocks and floor tiles for construction.

He is requesting financial help to buy cement and sand and a mixing machine with which he will be able to fabricate these materials.

He lives with his wife and is the father of one 8-year-old son. He strives day after day to give his son a good education and to build a good future for him.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand and a mixing machine in order to facilitate and speed up the production of his products.

loans.name: Nuhu

texts.en:
Nuhu is maize farmer from Liman village. As a member of Babban Gona, Nuhu is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support he has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Nuhu would have had to sell his maize at Harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Nuhu can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Nuhu is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest .

loans.name: Soái

texts.en:
Mr Soái is 38 years old and he is married. He has been working in agriculture raising marine aquaculture for more than 10 years.Soái lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

His family is a low-income household in village, moreover the market need is low in this region.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.
This is Soái first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. He hopes that this loan could make his little dream come true.

In the future, Soái hopes for his children to do well in school, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his business to do well.

loans.use: To purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet

loans.name: Judy Ann

texts.en:
Judy Ann engages in hog raising livelihood. She raises and sold pigs to the locals in her place.
Aside from hog raising, she also sold electronic load to neighbors and local dwellers who are prepaid users. She is twenty-seven years old woman and has a 6-year-old child living in the rural town of Panglao, Bohol.

She has requested a loan to buy piglets, pig feed and additional to up-load. These could help enhance her source of income and slowly able to settle her obligation. Thus, she could improve the quality of livestock she is about to raise and additional capital for her electronic loading business , that is on demand nowadays.

She is thankful for the funds and is determined to manage it successfully to support the welfare of her child.

loans.use: to buy piglets, pig feed and additional minutes to up-load .

loans.name: Mokhles

texts.en:
Mokhles is a 30-year-old married father of three. Due to the low financial situation of his family, he left school at early age and started working in the construction field specialized in paving and concrete painting. He has eleven years of experience in this domain and he gained it from his father, as he is well-known among his region for his professional skill.
Mokhles is working hard to develop his business, thus today he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy a car which will facilitate his work and allow him to move between his workshops easily.
Mokhles hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and stay capable of providing his family with descent living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a car which will facilitate his work

loans.name: Hawraa

texts.en:
Hawraa is an 18-year-old married mother of one child. She started, two years ago, selling Tupperware to help her husband in covering the increasing needs and expenses of their beloved child. She is a hard worker who has her loyal customers. 
Hawraa is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise with new collection of Tupperware to satisfy her customers' special requests. 
Hawraa hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and stay capable of providing her family with descent living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with new collection of Tupperware to satisfy her customers' requests

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is a married man. He has one child.

He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be competition.

Emmanuel will use the Kes 100,000 loan to buy another motorcycle.

He hopes that in the future, he will earn more and have a better life for his family. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to expand business.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle

loans.name: Rathnak

texts.en:
Rathnak is 18 years old and single. He lives with his family at Ta Khmoa Kandal province, Cambodia.

Rathnak is a student studying at Royal University of Phnom Penh, Cambodia, in the field of Khmer Literature, year 1, semester 1.

Now he needs money to pay for his school fees and buy a computer for his studying, so he applied to Maxima.

loans.use: to pay for his school fees and buy a computer.

loans.name: Pisith

texts.en:
Pisith is a 20-year-old a security guard. He is working for a company in the city. He resides with his parents in Phnom Penh City in Cambodia. He has been working as a security guard since 2014, earning around $4.83 a day. He is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in Information Technology at the university.

Because of a lack of financial support, Pisith would like to request a loan to pay for his first-year tuition fee. This loan will help him to go on to his first year at the university successfully.

In the future, he is going to find a better job with a reasonable salary, and he will be able to build his own house.

loans.use: to pay for his first-year tuition fee

loans.name: Katana

texts.en:
Katana is a married man. He has eight children. He describes himself to be honest.

He operates a retail business where he sells flour, rice, sugar, bread and other items. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in a marketable place, and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

Katana will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy maize flour, sugar, bread, rice and other items.

His business goal is to have a more productive business within five years. He hopes that in the future, the business will grow. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy maize flour, sugar, bread, rice and other items

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a 33 year old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and mother of three children still attending school. Her husband is the main income source and she also works from home in selling homemade food to satisfy the necessities of life and till now they earns a fair revenue.

That’s why, today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay her children’s educational fees. She said that the loan will surely help her to register them with the coming school year what makes her very happy and eager always to borrow loans from Kiva.

loans.use: to pay her children’s educational fees

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a Kiva borrower. He has eight children. He describes himself to be reliable.

He operates a retail business where he sells cashew nuts. He has been involved in this business for 15 years. His business is located in a good area, and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inflation.

Hamisi will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of cashew nuts.

His business goal is to own a retail shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will live a comfortable life. This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cashew nuts

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, con 23 años de edad, es un campesino dedicado a la cría, engorde y comercialización de pollos y cerdos, actividad que surgió por la necesidad de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía del hogar, pues se encontraba desempleado y su familia pasaba por una situación económica difícil. 
Los galpones se encuentran ubicados en el patio de la casa donde vive y cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres para realizar las labores. 

Aprendió de manera empírica y poco a poco su negocio fue aceptado en el sector, allí los familiares, vecinos y amigos son los principales compradores de los animales despresados. 

Su empuje, decisión y positivismo le han permitido salir adelante y le han dado una nueva oportunidad para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar concentrado para alimentar a las aves, compra de más pollos y cerdos esto le permitirá aprovechar bien el espacio que tiene disponible y podrá realizar a tiempo el engorde de las aves.

Esto se reflejará en el incremento de las ventas y por ende de los ingresos que recibe, con los que podrá seguir velando por el bienestar de su familia y además tendrá la oportunidad de fortalecer más su negocio y ampliar los galpones y la cantidad de aves, para tener mayor rentabilidad; de esta manera 
Juan ve más cerca el cumplimiento de su sueño, que es tener su negocio bien establecido pero en un lugar independiente de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juan, at 23 years old, is a farmer who works breeding, raising and selling chickens and pigs. This business arose from a need to generate income to support the economy of his home, as he was unemployed and his family went through a difficult economic period. The pens are located in the patio of the house where he lives, and he has the support of his parents in carrying out his work. He learned from practical experience, and little by little his business was accepted in the area. There, family, neighbors and friends are the primary buyers of butchered meat.

His drive, decisiveness and positivity have allowed him to get ahead and have given him a new opportunity to improve his family's living conditions. He currently seeks a loan to buy concentrated feed for his birds, and to buy more chickens and pigs. This will allow him to take good advantage of the space he has available, and he will be able to timely fatten up his birds. This will be reflected in the increase in sales and thereby in the income he receives, with which he will be able to continue looking after the welfare of his family. In addition, he will have the opportunity to further strengthen his business and enlarge his pens and quantity of birds, to have increased profits. In this manner Juan sees the fulfillment of his dream come closer, which is to have a well established business but in a place outside his home.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for his birds, and to buy more chicken and pigs, which will allow him to to take advantage of the space he has available.

loans.name: Nivine

texts.en: Nivine is a 26 year-old Lebanese married woman mother for two children, both of whom are attending school, living with her husband who is the income provider. She states that living costs are becoming very expensive. This is the reason why she is in real need today of taking a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, which funds will be paid at once to cover her children study fees. Her first goal is to insure a good educational level to them.

loans.use: to cover her children study fees

loans.name: Kadide

texts.en:
Kadide is a married woman with three children, all of whom attends school. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past six years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her business.

With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en: Simon is a married man. He has 1 child. He describes himself to be loving. He operates a farm where he grows vegetables. He has been involved in this business for 4 years. His business is located in a productive place and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy seeds and cover labor costs. His business goal is to have a large farm within 5 years. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy seeds and cover labor costs

loans.name: Maria Yaneth

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 35 años de edad, se dedicó inicialmente al negocio de las confecciones en el cual duro tres años como operaria, después de pasar este periodo de tiempo inicio manejando un taller con un amigo el cual le enseño el oficio y la guiaba en todo el proceso para adquirir su propio negocio. 

Es casada y es madre de dos hijos. Hace 5 años es una mujer independiente que gracias a los micro créditos tiene la posibilidad de ser su propia jefe y generar un empleo pues su pecera es reconocida por su buen servicio al cliente; solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como hilos y tela los cuales por la falta de capital no ha podido comprar, su principal sueño es tener un taller con muy buena producción, cómodo agradable en el cual pueda trabajar de la mejor manera, crecer día a día como empresaria generando empleo y calidad de vida a los seres queridos que la rodean.
texts.en:
Maria is a 35 year old woman. She started in the sewing business working for three years as an operator. After this period of time she started to running a shop with a friend who taught her the trade and guided her through all the process of acquiring her own business.

She is married and is the mother of two children. For five years she has been an independent woman who thanks to the micro-loans she has the possibility of being her own boss and generating a job as her shop is renown for it's good service to clients.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like thread and fabric which due to lack of capital she cannot buy. Her main dream is to have a workshop with high production, comfortable and agreeable where she can work in the best way, growing day by day as an entrepreneur generating employment and quality of living for her loved ones who surround her.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies to increase her production.

loans.name: Elie

texts.en: Elie is a 20-year-old single man. He is living with his parents and two siblings still attending school. His father is the main income source for the family to satisfy their needs. Due to this hard financial situation, today Elie is asking to take out a loan from Kiva's partner Vitas s.a.l. He will be using the loan to pay for the first installment of his brothers' study fees. In the future, he plans to take out new Kiva loans and keep on covering their study fees.

loans.use: to pay for the first installment of study fees for his brothers.

loans.name: Alirio Antonio

texts.es:
Alirio, a sus 28 años de edad vive en unión libre y es padre de 3 hijos. 

Nació y creció en el campo, donde su familia le enseñó todas las labores agrícolas y, gracias a ello hoy en día posee cultivos de frutas, ubicados en unos terrenos de su familia, los productos que cosecha los vende en el mercado, convirtiéndose esta en su principal fuente de ingresos, lo que le permite llevar el sustento diario a su familia. 

El cliente es un hombre activo, pujante, emprendedor y diariamente lucha para velar por el bienestar de su familia, pues ellos son su principal motivación para seguir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos, pues esta actividad es muy inestable e incierta. 

Esto lo lleva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, riegos, fertilizantes), que son necesarios para poder sacar la cosecha actual, preparar el terreno para sembrar nuevamente y así continuar con su labor. 

Alirio sueña con hacer crecer sus cultivos y hacer de su actividad un negocio más rentable, con el que pueda ofrecer a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y disfrutar los frutos de su ardua labor.
texts.en:
Alirio, at the age of 28, lives in free union and is the father of three children.

He was born and raised in the country, where his family taught him all the agricultural work, and thanks to that, he now has fruit crops located on some of his family's plots of land. He sells the products that he harvests in the market, converting this into his principal source of income, which allows him to bring daily sustenance to his family.

This client is an active, thriving, and entrepreneurial man who strives daily to look after the well-being of his family, since they are his principal motivation for continuing forward, overcoming various obstacles, since this business is very unstable and uncertain.

This brings him to apply for the loan that he will invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies (seeds, compost, irrigation, and fertilizers) that are necessary to be able to produce this season's harvest, prepare the land to plant again, and thus continue with his work.

Alirio dreams of making his crops increase and making his business more profitable. With this he can offer his family better living conditions and enjoy the fruits of his hard work.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (seeds, compost, irrigation, fertilizers).

loans.name: Andriamanampitrisa

texts.fr:
Andriamanampitrisa a 34 ans, sa femme, 30 ans, l’appui dans son activité. Le couple a 5 enfants, l’ainé a 16 ans. Les cinq enfants (16-14-11-7-5 ans) suivent leurs  études dans des écoles privées. 
Il a à peine une année d’expérience dans l’activité de vente de friperies qui se développe bien. Les lieux de vente sont les marchés hebdomadaires de la capitale. Animé d’une culture de crédit, il est actuellement à son septième prêt, il n’a pas cessé de développer des activités qui constituent sa principale source de revenus. Il avait commencé par l’ouverture d’une petite unité de gargote. Leur objectif est d’ouvrir une unité de grossiste de produits de première nécessité.
Le couple est propriétaire du local où vit la famille, leur rêve est de pouvoir éduquer leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Andriamanampitrisa is thirty-four years old. His wife, who is thirty, helps him with his business. They have five children, the eldest of which is sixteen. All five children (aged sixteen, fourteen, eleven, seven, and five) go to private schools.

He has just one year of experience selling second-hand clothing; the business is growing. Their points of sale are the capital city’s markets. Motivated by his awareness of financing opportunities, he is now on his seventh loan. He has not stopped developing new activities, and they now are his main source of revenues. He started by opening a small food stall. Their goal is to open a wholesale operation for necessity products.

The couple owns the place where the family lives. Their dream is to provide an education for their children.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Adolfina

texts.es:
Adolfina es una campesina de 57 años de edad, viuda y madre de 1 hijo. 

Nació en el seno de una familia campesina muy humilde y desde pequeña conoció todas las labores del campo, pues es una tradición familiar; hace algún tiempo trabajó como empleada en una finca lechera. Luego de eso comenzó a trabajar como independiente, pues posee cerdos de levante ubicado en la finca de un hermano allí cuida y engorda los animales para luego venderlos y así complementar su salario para llevar el sustento a su hijo. 

La cliente es una mujer pujante, activa y luchadora, su perseverancia le ha permitido conseguir nuevas alternativas para salir adelante, es por ello que se motiva a solicitar un crédito; el dinero será destinado para la compra de más cerdos de levante, alimento y materiales para construcción de cochera; esto le permitirá aumentar su capital de trabajo y aumentar su producción, con esto logrará mejorar las ventas y los ingresos que recibe por ellas. 

Adolfina sueña con fortalecer y ampliar su negocio, generando oportunidades de empleo y mejorar la calidad de vida para disfrutar al lado de su hijo, de un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Adolfina is a 57 year old peasant, widow and mother of one son.

She was born in a very humble peasant family and since she was small, she got to know all the tasks of the countryside since it is a family tradition. Some time ago she worked as an employee in a dairy farm. After that she began to work as an independent since she owns pigs for raising located in a brother’s farm. There she takes care of and fattens the animals to later sell them and in this way supplement her salary to bring her son sustenance. 

The client is a thriving, active and determined woman. Her perseverance has permitted her to find new alternatives to get ahead. This is why she motivates herself to request a loan. The money will be allocated for the purchase of more pigs for raising, food and materials for the construction of the pigpen. This will allow her to increase her work capital and to increase her production. With this she will achieve to better her sales and the income she receives from them. 

Adolfina dreams of strengthening and broadening her business, generating employment opportunities and to better the quality of life to enjoy with her son; of a better well-being.

loans.use: to buy more pigs for raising, food and materials for the construction of a pigpen

loans.name: Yesenia Paola

texts.es:
Yesenia es una mujer muy emprendedora y trabajadora, desde hace mucho tiempo ha querido ser independiente y tiene el deseo de poder montar su negocio de alquiler de lavadoras.

Actualmente puede materializar su sueño gracias su gran capacidad de trabajo, empuje y al apoyo que recibe de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que deseen que ella salga adelante con su negocio.

De este negocio dependerán su esposo y su hijo de 2 años a los cuales desea darles una mejor estabilidad.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar una lavadora para iniciar con su proyecto.

Con un préstamo podrás a poyar a una madre lleno de vida y empuje para su familia!
texts.en:
