Yesenia is a very entrepreneurial and hard-working woman. She has wanted to be independent for a long time, and she has the desire to be able to set up her business of renting washing machines.

Now she can make her dream real, thanks to her great capacity for work, her spirit, and the support that she receives from Interactuar Corporation and from the people who want her to get ahead with her business.

Her husband and her two-year-old son, to whom she wants to give better stability, will depend on this business.

She is applying for economic support to buy a washing machine to begin with her project.

With a loan, you will be able to support a mother who is full of life and spirit for her family.

loans.use: to begin a business of renting washing machines. With the support, she will purchase her first assets.

loans.name: Noong Luong 34 Group

texts.en:
Mr. Quan is an ethnic Thai man who is 38 years old. He is married and has two children. He lives with his wife and his children in a traditional Thai house, in a remote village where agriculture is the main source of income for people.

Like other villagers, Mr. Quan and his wife work very hard at cultivating land, and breeding animals. They have plenty of activities such as growing rice, corn and cassava, and breeding goats, chickens, ducks and geese. Because of the instability of his income from agricultural activities, Mr. Quan has always wanted to expand production.

This is the 6th time that Mr. Quan has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em Program and he will use the loan to buy baby fish and food to feed them. He hopes that his investment will reap a good profit so that he can gradually improve his income and living conditions for his family. Mr. Quan dreams of a more sufficient life for his family and a brighter future for his children. In the picture, he is standing first from the right.

loans.use: to buy baby fish and food to feed them

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a married man with one child. He describes himself to be ambitious. He operates a transportation business where he drives customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for two years.

Fredrick's business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regulars. He will use the 35,000 KES loan to buy a secondhand motorcycle. His business goal is to own a tuk tuk within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have increased profits and better living standards. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy a secondhand motorcycle.

loans.name: José Aimé

texts.fr:
José a 41 ans, et est marié. La vente de légumes est une activité familiale, sa femme l’aide dans l'exercice de cette activité. José a démarré l’activité de vente de légumes il y a maintenant 4 ans. Il souhaite développer l’activité par l’augmentation du fonds de roulement. Avant, José travaillait dans le secteur bâtiment. Il trouve que cette activité est beaucoup plus rémunératrice comparé à l’emploi salarié. Le lieu de vente se situe sur la place de marché de la ville. L’objectif est d’augmenter le stock de produits en quantité et qualité.
Le couple a six enfants (19-14-11-8-5 ans et 8 mois). Les 2 derniers ne sont pas encore scolarisés ; l’aîné de 19 ans s’adonne également aux activités de petit commerce. Le ménage loue un local.. L’objectif est l’extension de l’activité dans le but de pouvoir construire leur propre maison.
texts.en:
José is forty-one years old and married. He retails vegetables with his family: his wife helps him with the business.

José started selling vegetables four years ago. He wants to grow the business by increasing its working capital. Before, José used to work in construction. He finds this business much more profitable than being salaried. He sells at the city market. His goal is to improve and increase his stocks.

The couple have six children (19, 14, 11, 8, and 5 years old; 8 months). The youngest two do not yet go to school. The eldest, who is nineteen, also works in retail. The couple rents a place. Their objective is to grow their business to be able to build their own house.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables: cucumbers, bell peppers, eggplants.

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is a 46-year-old married mother of three children. 15 years ago, she started tailoring to help her husband cover the needs of their beloved children. She has professional skills in this domain, which helped her gain loyal customers.

Hanaa is working hard to develop her business. Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's Field Partner, Al Majmoua, to buy fashionable textiles to satisfy her customers' special requests. Hanaa hopes to expand her business in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fashionable textiles to satisfy her customers' special requests

loans.name: Alba Libia

texts.es:
Alba, a sus 39 años de edad, se dedica a realizar las labores del campo, ya que posee una marranera donde cría y engorda cerdos para posteriormente venderlos, esta actividad la aprendió desde que era pequeña, ya que sus padres le enseñaron todo lo relacionado con el manejo y el cuidado de sus animales. 

Solicita el crédito con el ánimo de comprar más lechones para cría y engorde, lo que le permitirá aumentar su capacidad de producción y por ende mejorará notablemente los ingresos que percibe por las ventas realizadas. 

Alba, con su empuje y dedicación desea seguir avanzando para cumplir el sueño de dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia y además, fortalecer su negocio para que sea más rentable y productivo.
texts.en:
Alba, at 39 years old, makes a living doing field labor since she owns a pig farm where she raises and fattens pigs to later sell them. This activity she she learned since she was small, since her parents showed her everything related to the management and care of her animals. 

She is requesting the loan with the hope to buy more piglets to raise and fatten, which will allow her to increase her production capacity and as a result will remarkably improve the income she receives from the realized sales. 

Alba, with her drive and dedication wishes to keep advancing to fulfill the dream of giving her family a better quality of life as well as to strengthen her business so it can be more profitable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and fatten, which will allow her to increase her production capacity

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
Safaa is a Lebanese married woman. She’s 28 and she lives with her husband and only child who is still in school. Her husband earns the family's main source of income to meet their needs and enhance their way of living.

Today, Safaa is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l., to pay the first installment of her child's school educational fees. This is her first loan, and she plans to take more Kiva loans in the future and help her child continue his education.

loans.use: to pay the first installment of her child's school educational fees.

loans.name: Yuliana Andrea

texts.es:
Yuliana a sus 23 años de edad se dedica a trabajar como empleada, actividad con la cual obtiene ingresos para aportar económicamente en su hogar, donde vive con su madre, ya que no es casada y no ha tenido hijos. 

Es una mujer emprendedora y le gusta estar en constante actividad para sentirse útil, por lo que se motiva para solicitar su primer crédito, con el fin de invertirlo en el pago de un curso de capacitación en repostería, ya que ve en esto una oportunidad de negocio rentable y sostenible en el tiempo. 

Yuliana sueña con poder iniciar un negocio y hacerlo crecer de manera efectiva.
texts.en:
Yuliana, 23 years old, is employed, an endeavor with which she earns income to contribute economically at home, where she lives with her mother since she's not married and doesn't have children.

She is an entrepreneurial woman and likes to be constantly active in order to feel useful, which is what has motivated her to seek out her first loan. With it, she plans to invest in paying for a training course in pastry-making. In this, she sees a profitable and sustainable business opportunity over time. Yuliana has a powerful dream of starting a business and making it grow effectively.

loans.use: pay for a training course in pastry-making.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
Alejandra, con 28 años de edad, es madre de 4 hijos y responsable de su hogar junto con su esposo. 

Desde hace 4 años, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una sala de belleza que inició como alternativa para generar recursos que le permitieran velar por el bienestar de su familia, trabaja sola todos los días durante 6 horas, la actividad la aprendió tomando clases en una academia de belleza y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector por la calidad de su servicio. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar equipos de peluquería y los diferentes utensilios e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos capilares, tinturas, shampoo, acondicionador, entre otros), así estará en la capacidad de generar un empleo directo y además podrá prestar un mejor servicio, pues los clientes estarán más cómodos, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe. 

Alejandra con su perseverancia y proyección hacia un futuro, desea hacer crecer su salón de belleza, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo para madres cabezas de familia, dando como resultado un mejor bienestar no sólo para su familia, sino que aportará para que otras personas puedan disfrutar de mejores condiciones para vivir.
texts.en:
Alejandra is 28-years old. She is the mother of 4 children and, with her husband, responsible for her home. 4 years ago she started working in her own business, a beauty salon that she stared as an alternative to get an income that allows her to look after the wellbeing of her family. She works alone every day for 6 hours. She learned the job from taking classes in a beauty school, and gradually acquired more knowledge and perfected her techniques, which has allowed her to make herself known in the area for the quality of her service.

Now she is asking for loan support to buy hairdressing equipment and the different utensils and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, dyes, shampoo, conditioner, and others). This way she will be capable of getting direct employment and will also be able to give a better service because her customers will be more comfortable which will help her to improve her sales and the income that she earns.

With her perseverance and projection towards the future, Alejandra wants to make her beauty salon grow so she can get more employment opportunities for single mothers. As a result, this will give her better well-being not only for her family but it will also support other people to be able to enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hairdressing equipment and the different utensils and supplies wholesale (hair treatments, dyes, shampoo, conditioner, and others).

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
Ofelia es una mujer de 38 años de edad que trabaja como ama de casa en una finca en el municipio de El Carmen de Viboral. 

Allí posee algunas vacas lecheras cuya producción diaria es vendida a sus vecinos. La cliente, con su espíritu emprendedor, con su empuje, perseverancia y con el ánimo de complementar los ingresos familiares y personales, solicita un apoyo económico a la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de otra vaca productora de leche para mejorar su negocio de manera independiente, aprovechar el terreno de pasto que poseen en la finca y aumentar su producción, todo esto dará como resultado el aumento en los ingresos con los que puede aportar a la economía de su hogar. 

Un objetivo muy claro que ella tiene es seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos y adquirir más ganado lechero para hacer de su actividad, un negocio rentable y perdurable en el tiempo, que en un futuro le dé la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Ofelia is a woman of 38 years old that works as a housewife in a farm in the township of El Carmen de Viboral.

There she owns a few dairy cows whose daily production is sold to her neighbors. The client, with her outgoing spirit, with her drive, perseverance and with the hope of supplementing the family and personal incomes, is requesting economic support from the Corporación Interactuar [Corporation To Interact] to invest it in the purchase of another milk producing cow to improve her business in an independent way; take advantage of the pasture field which they own on the farm and to increase her production, all of this having as a result an increase in the income with which she can contribute to the economy of her home. 

A very clear objective which she has is to keep working to fulfill the dream of paying for her kids’ university studies and to obtain more dairy livestock to make of her activity, a profitable and long lasting business; that in the future it will give her the opportunity to have a better quality of life and well-being for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy another milk producing cow to improve her business in an independent way

loans.name: Wilmer Jose

texts.es:
Wilmer, con 20 años de edad, es un joven muy emprendedor, trabajador y tenaz.

Desde hace 1 año, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una barbería que inició como alternativa para generar recursos que le permitieran obtener ingresos para su familia, la actividad la aprendió con un amigo que le enseño este arte y poco a poco fue adquiriendo más conocimientos y perfeccionando sus técnicas, lo que le ha permitido darse a conocer en el sector por la calidad de su servicio. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para realizar una reforma a su local, comprar sillas y 2 máquinas de motilar profesionales, así estará en la capacidad de generar un empleo directo y además podrá prestar un mejor servicio, pues los clientes estarán más cómodos, lo que le ayudará a mejorar sus ventas y los ingresos que percibe. 

Wilmer con su perseverancia y proyección hacia un futuro, desea hacer crecer su negocio, en el que pueda generar más oportunidades de empleo, dando como resultado un mejor bienestar no sólo para su familia, sino que aportará para que otras personas puedan disfrutar de mejores condiciones para vivir.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 20-years old. He is a young man, very entrepreneurial, hard-working and tenacious. 1 year ago he started working in his own business, a barber shop that he started as an alternative to get an income which allows him to get an income for his family. He learned this job from a friend who taught him the art and gradually he made himself known in the area for the quality of his service.

Now he is asking for loan support to remodel his shop, buy chairs and 2 professional hair cutting machines. This way he will be able to get direct employment and will also be able to give a better service because the customers will be more comfortable and this will help him to improve his sales and the income that he earns.

With his perseverance and projection towards the future, Wilmer wants to make his business grow so he can create more employment opportunities and, as a result, a better wellbeing not only for his family, but he will also provide other people with being able to enjoy better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy chairs and two professional hair cutters. He will generate employment and give a better service.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy owns a "carenderia" (eatery), serving locals and nearby residents in the rural town of Talibon, Bohol. For the past 11 years, she sold homemade meals at affordable prices and delicious menus.

Mercy is married and has four children, ages 9-18 years old. Her husband has an income that helps defray the family's daily expenses.

Mercy decided to join CEVI to access loans and boost her business. She wants to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, seasonings and other supplies like rice and soft drinks. These are vital in her day-to-day activities. She will be able to cope with demands, which will enable her to augment her earnings and start to pay her obligation. Mercy dreams that someday she will become a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, seasonings and other supplies like rice and soft drinks.

loans.name: Maria Fatima

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Tiene un almacén en el que vende ropa. Inicio el negocio hace 1 año y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

Ella desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser más prospera. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta como ropa interior.

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de entidades como Interactuar que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.
texts.en:
Maria is a woman full of energy to take on the world, and have a full life thanks to her efforts.

She has a large store where she sells clothing. She started the business one year ago, and in spite of her short time in operation, she has enjoyed a good reception in the sector.

She wants to expand her stock and improve her sales, injecting capital into her business. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to give herself the opportunity to be more prosperous.

The money will be invested in the purchase of merchandise that she doesn't currently have, such as underwear.

She has big dreams for her business, and she thinks that her future can improve considerably, thanks to the support of organizations like Interactuar that make it possible for people to dream of a better and more stable life.

loans.use: to stock her clothing business. She wants to have everything ready for the Halloween and Christmas seasons.

loans.name: Fanjaniaina Santa

texts.fr:
Lala a 34 ans. Elle est mariée. Son mari  travaille dans une petite unité d’ouvrage métallique. L’ainé (9 ans) de ses deux enfants est scolarisé. 
Son magasin général a été crée en 2014, implanté en milieu rural. Les produits vendus étaient encore peu diversifiés, Le problème rencontré est la hausse de prix  des produits. En cette période, les produits les plus demandés par les clients sont les fournitures scolaires (période de rentrée), les produits de première nécessité, le riz et le manioc (la majorité de la production rizicole étant déjà consommée),  et du son pour l’élevage. Pour toutes ces raisons, il est important de constituer un stock suffisant de produits. 
Leur objectif est de devenir être  demi gros, approvisionnant touts les unités d’épicerie et de magasin général de la zone.
texts.en:
Lala is 34 years old. She is married and her husband works in a metalworking shop. Her oldest child is nine and goes to school.

She opened her general store in 2014 in a rural location. At first, the products she offered weren't diverse and the prices were high.

During this time, the most sought-after products were school supplies (especially during the start of school), staple products like rice and then cassava (when most of the rice crop had been consumed), and bran for livestock. For all of these reasons, it is important to have enough stock.

Their goal is to become a retailer-wholesaler, supplying all the groceries and general stores in the area.

loans.use: buy school supplies and staple products.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago es un joven soltero de 19 años de edad, vive con sus padres a quienes ayuda económicamente. 

Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado en diferentes restaurantes, pero un día tomó la decisión de iniciar su propio negocio y, como no posee el capital completo decide pedir ayuda.

Actualmente se encuentra muy ilusionado con este negocio de restaurante, está decidido a iniciar con este nuevo proyecto productivo, solicita el apoyo del crédito, con el que comprará utensilios de cocina, un carro de comidas rápidas y materia prima al por mayor (salsas, carnes, gaseosas, harina para arepas, huevos, aceite, papas, entre otros), así podrá poner en marcha su idea de negocio, del cual espera obtener buenos resultados, pues sueña con que la gente llegue, consuma sus productos y vuelva y, lograr ser reconocido en el sector, lo que le permitirá generar los recursos suficientes para dar a sus padres una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
Santiago is a 19 year old young bachelor. He lives with his parents who he helps economically.

Throughout his life, he has worked in different restaurants, but one day he took the decision to start his own business and, since he does not have the complete capital, he’s decided to ask for help.

Currently, he has his hopes very high over this restaurant business. He is determined to start with this new productive project. He requests the loan’s support, with which he will buy kitchen utensils, a fast foods cart and basic supplies wholesale (salsas, meats, sodas, flour for arepas, eggs, oil, potatoes, among other things.)

In this way, he’ll be able to start-up his business idea, from which he hopes to obtain good results, since he dreams that people will come, consume his products, return and to achieve recognition in the sector, which will allow him to generate the necessary resources to give his parents better stability.

loans.use: to start a sale of fast foods, to buy the sale stand, utensils and supplies

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es:
Maria, a sus 53 años de edad vive con su esposo y es madre de 6 hijos.  

Desde que tenía 16 años, ella comenzó a laborar en el campo de la confección, pues le colaboraba a una Tía que tenía una empresa grande y allí se encargaba de pulir y revisar las prendas, cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad fue vinculada a la empresa, donde laboró por algunos años. 

Hace aproximadamente 1 año, Maria se independizó y montó su taller con gran empuje; afianzó su taller con la esperanza de que las ventas aumentaran y así fue, comenzó a conseguir contratos con terceros. De esta forma ha obtenido los ingresos para el sustento de su familia. 

Con el crédito que solicita desea comprar una máquina plana industrial, con el fin de brindarle a sus clientes una prenda bien elaborada y con excelente terminación, así aumentará los contratos y podrá generar mayores ingresos para poder cumplir el sueño de tener una línea propia, además de brindar oportunidades de empleo a otras  personas. 

Ella sabe que Interactuar es un gran apoyo para el crecimiento de su empresa!
texts.en:
Maria, at 53 years old lives with her husband and is mother of 6 kids. 

Since she was 16, she began to work in the field of dressmaking, since she contributed to an aunt who had a big business. There she was responsible for finalising and checking the garments. When she became an adult she was connected to the business, where she worked for some years. 

Approximately a year ago, Maria became independent and set up her shop with great drive; she cemented her shop with the hope that sales would increase. And so it was. She began to get contracts with third parties. Like this she has obtained the income for the sustenance of her family.

With the loan that she is requesting, she wishes to buy a flat bed machine, with the aim of providing a well produced garment and with excellent finishing. In this way she will increase the contracts and will be able to generate bigger earnings to fulfill the dream of having her own line as well as providing employment opportunities to other people.

She knows that Interactuar is a great support for the growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy an industrial flat bed machine, with the aim of providing a well produced garment and with excellent finishing.

loans.name: Simplicio

texts.en: Simplicio is a single father of three children who lives with his family in Capucao, Ozamiz, Misamis Occidental, in the Philippines. He grows and harvests corn, so he has to get up early and go to the fields where he oversees his crops. Simplicio has recently taken out a new loan to buy fertilizers and organic pesticides for his farm so he can have a more productive harvest. He plans to buy a vehicle to use for transportation between his farm and the market.

loans.use: to buy fertlizers and organic pesticides.

loans.name: Hoda

texts.en: Hoda is a married 45-year-old Lebanese woman with three children. She is really attached to her family. Her husband works tirelessly to be able to cover the family's big expenses so they can live a respectable life. Today, because the new school year is coming, Hoda is asking for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas S.A.L. to pay her children's educational fees. The family's only target and dream is to see the children achieve higher positions in life.

loans.use: to pay her children's educational fees.

loans.name: Hicham

texts.en:
Hicham is a 27-year-old Lebanese married father who lives with his family, including his three children who are still in school. He is the main income source for the family so that they can fulfil their needs. He owns a furniture shop in his town.
Today, Hicham is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas S.A.L. to pay his children’s educational fees. He states that this loan will help him to become a better supporter of his family.

loans.use: to pay his children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es:
El señor Celestino de 65 años de edad vive con su  esposa ,  tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 26 años al negocio de la venta de maíz, cría de ganado, venta de leña seca y cultivo de maíz, sus clientes son los amigos que tiene en la ciudad de Nacaome, al sur de Honduras.
 Don Celestino es un hombre ya de edad pero muy trabajador con deseos de salir adelante. Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de fertilizantes, leña, maíz. Ya que tiene siembras y necesita el abono, la compra de leña para luego revenderlas, agradece a el préstamo que solicita a Prisma está muy contento por el apoyo a su inversión,
 Su sueño para este año es terminar por completo un pozo que gracias a la ayuda de la institución  ha avanzado en el mismo.
San Lorenzo  honduras-  de Septiembre del 2015.
texts.en:
Celestino is 65 years old and lives with his wife in their own home. For 26 years he has had a business growing and selling corn, raising livestock and selling dry firewood. His customers are his friends in the city of Nacaome, in southern Honduras. Celestino is an older man, but very hard-working with the desire to get ahead in life.

He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizers, firewood and corn. This is because he has crops and needs manure; the firewood is to buy and resell.

He is grateful for the loan he requesting from Prisma, and is very happy about the support for his investment.

His dream for this year is to totally complete a well, which thanks to the help of the institution he has made progress on.

San Lorenzo, Honduras- September 2015.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, firewood and corn.

loans.name: Safarbibi

texts.ru: Сафарбиби счастливая мать. У нее 7 детей. Она родилась и выросла в районе Хуросон. И вышла замуж за дехканина. У нее большая и дружная семья. Ее старший сын занимается таксистом, он перевозит людей и зарабатывает на жизнь. Младшие помогает маме в работе. Сафарбиби 1998 году освоила деятельность отца и начала продвигать деятельность. Дед и отец занимались животноводческой деятельности. Сафарбиби решила идти по их стопам. Она выращивает мелко рогатого скота у себя в коровнике. У нее имеется хорошие условия для животноводческой деятельности. Сафарбиби хочет купить скота для расширения деятельности. Но у Сафарбиби нет финансы, и решила обратиться к Вам за кредитом. Ее доходы от животноводческой деятельности. Сафарбиби ждет Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Safarbibi is the happy mother of seven children.  She was born and grew up in the Khuroson district of Tajikistan.  She got married to a farmer and she now has a large and friendly family.  Her oldest son works as a taxi driver and makes a living transporting passengers.  Her younger children help her with the farm work.  Safarbibi took over her father's business in 1998 and has developed it since then.  Her grandfather and father also used to be involved in animal husbandry, so Safarbibi decided to follow in their footsteps.  Safarbibi has a barn at home where she raises small livestock.  Her property is nicely set for this type of activity.  

Safarbibi now wants to buy additional livestock to expand her activity.  However, she doesn't have the financial means to do so, which is the reason why she has decided to turn to you for a loan.  All her income comes from animal husbandry activity.  Safarbibi is awaiting your support.

loans.use: to buy livestock and expand her animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is a married woman. She has 1 child. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells bananas. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located in a highly populated place and her primary customers are the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of bananas. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bananas

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en: Maria Fe is 49 years old from Balucot, Tambulig, Zamboanga, Del Sur with 4 dependents. She works hard on the farm, growing rice. She is asking for the loan to purchase farm inputs expenses. She wants to increase her family's benefit. Any additional profit will go towards expansion of her farming business. In the future, she hopes to see her children having a better chance in life through attending school.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a married man. He has 3 children. He operates a retail business where he sells soap, flour, bread, sugar and other items. He has been involved in this business for 6 years. His business is located in an area with potential and his primary customers are individuals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

He will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, soap and other items. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to purchase additional stock.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, bread, flour, soap and other items

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel is a married man. He has 5 children. He describes himself to be optimistic. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his tuk tuk. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a busy place and his primary customers are individuals.

He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. He will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy tuk tuk spare parts. He hopes that in the future, he will buy land. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy tuk tuk spare parts

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a tailoring shop where he makes clothes. He has been involved in this business for 6 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. He hopes that in the future, he will have increased income. He will reinvest the anticipated profits to the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tailoring materials

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 46 years old and married with five children. With four children in school, Rowena works very hard to provide for them.

Rowena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, home product care and other groceries.

Rowena has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items.

In the future, Rowena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, junk foods, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Eng is 37 years old living in Kandal Steong district of Kandal province and a father of three children who are all in school. To support his living condition, he has been growing rice for 10 years. Moreover, he has raised pigs and distilled alcohol to get additional income as well. Eng repaid his past loan successfully which enabled him to improve his lifestyle.

Now, he lacks of working capital to support his business, he decides to get a new loan with VisionFund in order to buy fertilizer to increase productivity of his crop yield and the rest of money will be spend on pigs feed to support his pig-raising business. He hopes this second loan will help him to earn more income to support his children’s studies until their graduation and improve his family’s living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to increase productivity of his crop yield so as to earn more income in order to keep supporting his children's studying.

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en: Rachel is a married woman with 2 children. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a good place and her primary customers are regulars. She will use the KES 80,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to expand the business within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have good living conditions.  She will use the anticipated profits to open another shop.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.en: Jamshed was born in 1982. He is a kind and clever man. Jamshed is married and has 4 children. He is a very responsible father. Jamshed is a master of repairing cars. He has worked in this field more than 3 years. Jamshed works hard and performs his job with responsibility. Jamshed is the only breadwinner in the family. His income is not enough to provide the family with all the neccessities. Now, his child is ill and Jamshed must buy medicines to treat his child. Jamshed is asking for a loan of 5000 TJS to buy medicines for treatment of his child. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy medicines for treatment of his child.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a Kiva borrower. She has 5 children. She describes herself to be optimistic. She operates a food café. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are regular.

She will use the Kes 70,000 loan to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food. Her business goal is to have a big restaurant within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have better living standards.. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to invest in another business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ingredients for preparing food.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a married man. He has 6 children. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

He will use the Kes 60,000 loan to service and maintain his motorcycle. He hopes that in the future, he will be financially stable. This is his fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to service and maintain his motorcycle

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is 43 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Arlene is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Arlene has been in pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lourdes is 28 years old and has one child in school.

Lourdes has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. Lourdes requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business.

Lourdes has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Lourdes would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Heminia

texts.en:
Heminia is 48 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Heminia is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Heminia has been farming vegetables for 4 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is 47 years old and married with four children. Lorena works very hard to provide for them.

Lorena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, home product care, and other groceries.

Lorena has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Lorena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Lucita

texts.en:
Lucita is 57 years old and married with six children. With one child in school, Lucita works very hard to provide for them.

Lucita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, rice, home product care, and other  groceries.

Lucita has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Lucita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, rice, home product care, and other  groceries

loans.name: Kanymbubu

texts.ru: Канымбубу, 27 лет, замужем, есть сын, ему 1 год. У Канымбубу высшее бухгалтерское образование. Канымбубу на протяжении 4 лет занимается торговлей продуктами питания в собственном магазине возле дома. На сегодняшний день наработаны постоянные клиенты, в обороте есть товар на сумму 300,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячная прибыль- около 22,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Канымбубу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку продуктов питания для увеличения ассортимента товаров в магазине. Доходы от кредита Канымбубу планирует вложить в увеличение площади магазина.
texts.en: Kanymbubu is 27, married, and the mother of a one-year-old little boy.  She has a university education and has studied to become an accountant.  For the past four years, she's been selling food products in her own shop located next to her house.  Today, she has some regular customers and her inventory is worth 300,000 som (KGS).  She makes a monthly income of about 22,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, Kanymbubu has turned to Kiva's partner, Bai Tushum Bank, and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS).  This loan will allow her to buy food products and increase her shop inventory.  She is planning to reinvest the earnings from her loan into increasing her shop's surface area.

loans.use: to purchase food products in order to increase her shop inventory.

loans.name: Nelida

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Nelida works hard to support her family.

She has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Nelida is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to  buy nipa leaves, bamboo stick, etc. for her nipa roofing business.

Nelida has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy nipa leaves, bamboo stick, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 50 years old and married with two children. Maria works very hard to provide for them.

Maria runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like personal product care, home product care, and other groceries.

Maria has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items. 

In the future, Maria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like personal product care, home product care and other groceries.

loans.name: Agim

texts.en:
Agim is the father of three children and a professional electrician, who is the main source of income for his family. He also does contract work on his own, through a workshop he has in his home. The freelance work helps to add to his income since his regular electrical job pays a low salary and his wife stays home to take care of the house and children.

At this time Agim is in need of a loan to purchase new tools and renovate his workshop. He promises to pay on time.

loans.use: to purchase new tools and renovate his electrian workshop

loans.name: Adla

texts.en:
Adala is a 24-years-old single young lady from Nablus city. Her father works as a construction worker, where he gets a low and unstable income. Thus income is barely covers all the big family needs.

Adala is a student in the local university . She wants to take the BA degree and find a job in the future to support his family.
Adala took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the university fees for the first semester. By taking this loan, Adala will be able to register in the university and pay part of the urgent expenses she has.
Adala appears in the photo

loans.use: to pay the university fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Mostafa

texts.en:
Mostafa is a 53 year old Lebanese married man living with his family and father of 5 children, two of them are still attending school. He is the main income source in the family in order to fulfill the family needs. He works as a fisherman, and his oldest daughter works as a private teacher and helps him with the family expenses.

Today, he is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay his children’s educational fees. He states that this loan will help him to become a better supporter to his family.

loans.use: to pay his children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells tomatoes, onions and other vegetables. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

She will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy more stock of vegetables. Her business goal is to own a grocery shop within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have increased income. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
As a married mother of seven children, Merlita works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising ducks.  Merlita is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF in order to buy more sea foods to sell to customers.

Merlita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sea foods to sell.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard  working entrepreneur. Emma is 48 years old and has five children who are in school.

Emma has a food vending business in the Philippines. Emma requested a PHP 10000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, spices, seasonings, etc. for her food vending business.

Emma has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, spices, seasonings, etc. for her food vending business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 44 years old, married with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

Marilyn has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Marilyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to resell.

Marilyn has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to resell.

loans.name: Lory

texts.en:
Lory is 53 years old, married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Lory has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell like shampoo, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Lina Marcela

texts.es:
Lina es una mujer de 28 años de edad, es casada y madre de una niño de 10 años. 
Vive con su esposo, a quien apoya económicamente.  Es una mujer muy estudiosa y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, por eso se motivó a solicitar el crédito con la Corporación, para destinarlo al pago de una capacitación en preparación de asados y parrilla, ya que quiere adquirir conocimientos y experiencia para poder encontrar más oportunidades de trabajo con su negocio de atención de banquetes. 

Su meta es poder ampliar su menú y variedad para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lina is 28 years old, married and has a ten-year-old daughter.

Lina lives with her husband, whom she supports financially. Lina is very studious and really wants to move forward. She is therefore applying for a loan from Interactuar. Lina will use this loan to pay for training in preparing roasted and grilled meats as she wants to gain knowledge and experience to find more work opportunities with her banqueting business.

Lina's goal is to expand her menu and the variety of options for her customers.

loans.use: to pay for training in preparing roasted and grilled meats.

loans.name: Divanelly

texts.es:
Divanelly, una mujer de 40 años de edad que ha dado toda su vida en beneficio de su familia intentando sacarla  adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. 
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 4 horas.

Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.

De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.

Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en el barrio y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Apoya a Divanelly con su negocio!
texts.en:
Divanelly, aged 40, has dedicated her life to her family, trying to help them get ahead and to overcome the difficulties that they have had to face. She devoted a lot of effort, patience and sacrifice into setting up her store, which provides sufficient income to support her children. She works for 4 hours each day.

She hopes to become the best family business in her sector, and is requesting a loan in order to be able to expand her stock with products such as grains and groceries. This will help her to overcome difficulties such as low sales and competition.

This loan will provide a great opportunity for her to establish her store as the most productive in the neighborhood, allowing her to fulfill her long-held dream of making improvements to her home.

Support Divanelly in her business!

loans.use: to expand her stock with products such as grains and groceries.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Doña Esperanza junto a su familia se dedican al cultivo de yuca. Solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (₡ 1 000 000), para la compra de insumos agrícolas necesarios para el buen desarrollo de dicho cultivo. De esta manera Esperanza logrará incrementar su nivel de producción y aumentar los ingresos de su actividad.
texts.en: Esperanza works cultivating yucca with her family. She is asking for a loan of one million colones to buy agricultural supplies for the good development of these crops. This way, Esperanza will manage to increase her production level and increase the income from this job.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for yucca crops.

loans.name: Wilson Hernando

texts.es:
Wilson nació y creció en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas gracias a las enseñanzas de su familia, que toda la vida se dedicó a las tareas del campo. 

Hoy en día posee unas hectáreas de tierra de su propiedad y en ellas posee cultivos de café y plátano, cuya cosecha es recolectada y vendida en el mercado del municipio donde reside. 

El cliente es un señor activo, pujante y trabajador, diariamente se levanta temprano para comenzar con el cuidado de sus cultivos que son su principal fuente de ingresos para solventar los gastos y necesidades básicas de su hogar. 

Se motiva para solicitar el crédito, con la intención de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, riegos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, entre otros para preparar el terreno que tiene disponible y sembrar más cultivos, con esto le dará continuidad a su negocio aumentando su producción, lo que se verá reflejado en el incremento de sus ingresos. 

De esta manera, Wilson se permite soñar con tener muchos más cultivos y ser un gran comerciante de sus productos, para poder tener mejores condiciones de vida y brindar una estabilidad económica y calidad de vida a todo su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Wilson was born and raised in the countryside, where he learned about agriculture from his family, who have always worked on the land.

Currently, he owns several hectares of land, where he cultivates coffee and banana crops. They are harvested and sold in the market of the town where he lives.

He is an active, vigorous and hard-working man, who gets up early each day to care for his crops. They provide the main source of income for his household.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, irrigation tools, pesticides, etc. for preparing his fields and sowing more crops. This will allow him to continue and expand his business, and will increase his earnings.

In this way, Wilson hopes to achieve his dream of raising and selling many more crops, so that he can enjoy better living conditions and provide his family with economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, irrigation tools, pesticides, etc. for his fields.

loans.name: Rosa Eva

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 38 años de edad, casada y madre de tres hijos. Actualmente se dedica a laborar como cocinera en un restaurante y con esto ha obtenido dinero para apoyar la carga económica en su casa. 

“Quiero capacitarme para mejorar a nivel profesional y así conseguir mejores oportunidades en el campo laboral, que me permitan llevar el sustento a mi casa y satisfacer las necesidades básicas de mis hijos” con estas palabras Rosa manifiesta su motivación para solicitar el crédito el cual invertirá en el pago de un programa de capacitación en Cocina Fusión.

Su principal meta inicialmente es tener la oportunidad de empleo en un restaurante reconocido de la ciudad, donde pueda adquirir experiencia y, a mediano plazo poder iniciar su propio restaurante, con el fin de generar oportunidades de trabajo para otras personas y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 38-year old woman. She is married and the mother of 3 children. Currently she works as a cook in a restaurant and with this she has gotten money to support the economic burden of her home. "I want to get training to improve to a professional level and this way I will get better opportunities in the work field which will allow me to provide food in my house and satisfy the basic needs of my children."

With these words, Rosa shows her motivation to ask for a loan to invest in the payment of a training program in Fusion Kitchen. Her main goal, initially, is to have a job opportunity in a well-known restaurant in the city, where she could get experience and, in the mean time, start her own restaurant with the purpose of getting work opportunities for other people and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in the payment of a training program in Fusion Kitchen offered in Interactuar.

loans.name: Juan Diego

texts.es:
El trabajo del campo es una de las labores más difíciles hoy en día por el gran esfuerzo que se debe hacer para progresar y poder salir adelante, pero Juan es un hombre que nunca se ha rendido a pesar del clima o las circunstancias que puedan pasar, él siempre está dispuesto a conseguir los recursos para su familia.

Se levanta desde primera hora de la mañana para desplazarse a distintas fincas para cumplir con sus obligaciones laborales como jornalero.

Este oficio lo alterna con la venta de leche que obtiene de sus propias vacas.
El desea aumentar su capital de trabajo para garantizar el sostenimiento de sus negocios y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca lechera que tiene un socio. 

Este préstamo le dará un buen impulso a su negocio y le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida para ofrecer a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Field work is one of the most difficult tasks today for the great effort that it has to be made to progress and to be able to succeed, but Juan is a man who has never given up. Despite the weather or the circumstances that may happen, he is always willing to get the resources for his family.

Juan gets up from early in the morning to move to different farms to fulfill his work duties as a day laborer. He alternates this work with the sale of milk obtained from his own cows. He wishes to increase his working capital to ensure the sustainability of his businesses; this is the reason that leads him to request a loan to invest it in the purchase of a milk cow from a partner. This loan will give him a great boost to his business and will allow him to have a better quality of life to offer to his loved ones.

loans.use: for the purchase of a milk cow.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en:
Eulalia works hard to support her family. She is married and has had a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines for 10 years now.

Eulalia has requested a 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Dencita

texts.en:
Dencita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 16,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Dencita has been in this business for 30 years and she earns extra income from catching fish herself. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Dencita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her businesses in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is a hard-working entrepreneur with six children. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell, such as canned goods and personal care products.

Nelly industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pig fattening. She has successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Nelly dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is 58 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by farming sugar cane in the Philippines. She is borrowing 16,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ma. Fe has been farming sugar cane for thirty years and also earns additional income from running a general store and fattening pigs. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
Ni el alto costo de los insumos, ni la competencia que se vive en sector porcicola, hacen que Luis se rinda en el cumplimiento de sus sueños y metas.

Luis es un joven que trabaja fuertemente en beneficio de su familia, pudiendo así darles el apoyo que necesitan sin descuidar en ningún momento su deseo de estudiar.

El solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos de levante para capitalizar su negocio, compra de materiales para construcción de cochera y alimento ya que es este su único medio de trabajo y supervivencia.

Con este crédito podrá sacar adelante a su familia y su actividad.
texts.en:
Neither the high cost of inputs nor the competition that exists in the porcine sector make Luis surrender in fulfilling his dreams and goals. He is a young man who works hard on behalf of his family, thus being able to give them the support they need without neglecting at any time his desire to study.

Luis is requesting a loan for the purchase of shoat pigs to add capital to his business, for the purchase of materials to build a pig stable, and for food since this is his only means of work and survival. With this loan, he will be able to bring up his family and his business.

loans.use: to buy shoat pigs to add capital to his business, materials to build a pig stable, and food.

loans.name: Enderson Mauricio

texts.es:
Enderson es un humilde trabajador residente en el municipio de La Dorada con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 
Es un joven soltero que vive con sus padres.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la elaboración y venta de limonadas en su propia casa.
Le dedica 8 horas diarias a su negocio.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una motocicleta en la cual pueda transportarse el mismo y su producto.
texts.en:
Enderson is a humble hard-worker who lives in the municipality of La Dorada with a life full of dreams, hopes and the best desires for his family.

He is a single young man who lives with his parents.

These days, he earns his living making and selling lemonade in his own house.

He works at his business for 8 hours each day.

Of the principal difficulties that he has to face in his work are the heavy rains and the high cost of the raw materials.

He asks for a loan to purchase a motorcycle to transport himself and his product.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to transport himself and his product.

loans.name: Ingrid Del Carmen

texts.es:
Desde el año 2010 Ingrid encontró la fórmula para sentirse útil y poder generar sus propios ingresos y lo logro gracias a la venta de artículos en su miscelánea.

Ingrid es una responsable, trabajadora y servicial mujer de 39 años de edad que se enorgullece de no tener que pedir dinero a nadie pues ella misma se consigue sustento. 

Solicita un crédito para comprar carcasas y accesorios para celular al por mayor y así poder venderlos a un mejor precio.

Con tu ayuda Ingrid podrá mejorar su capital y tener un mejor sustento, apoya hoy!
texts.en:
Since the year 2010, Ingrid has found the formula to feel useful and be able to generate her own income and she managed it thanks to the sale of items in her variety store.

Ingrid is a responsible, hard-working, and helpful woman, 39 years old, who is proud of not having to ask anyone for money because she earns her own sustenance.

She asks for a loan to purchase cases and accessories for cell phones in bulk and, so, to be able to sell them at a better price.

With your help, Ingrid will be able to improve her capital and have a better sustenance, support her today!

loans.use: to purchase cases and accessories for cell phones in bulk and, so, to be able to sell them at a better price.

loans.name: Stella

texts.en:
Greetings from Nkubu, Kenya! Stella is a 43-year-old farmer. She is the mother of a lovely family and is hard-working, humble, and responsible. When she was a girl, she learned to do all of the tasks involved in farming, thanks to her parents' teachings.

Stella has been a farmer for more than ten years. She keeps poultry for eggs, cows for milk and grows maize and vegetables to sell. She also engages in small businesses on the side whenever an opportunity crosses her path. Despite the rapid fluctuation of prices in the market, Stella is very passionate and optimistic about the future of farming in Kenya.

Stella is seeking a loan to expand her farm and she intends to buy farm inputs. This move is quite a big deal for her. With the loan she will be able to buy inputs such as animal feeds and fertilizers that will help in increasing her production.

In the long run, with increased income, she will finally be able to satisfy her family’s basic needs. “In the future, I will be able to provide food for my family and also educate my children,” she said.
Profits from the loan will be used in repaying the loan and expanding her business. Please help out this heroine!

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as feeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Dubbier Neis

texts.es:
Dubbier, con 22 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es padre de 1 hijo. Se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, un visionario y buen negociante. 

Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo bebidas como gaseosas en el municipio de Tierra Alta y, desde hace 2 años tiene su propio negocio.  

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Dubbier acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido e inventario de licores, gaseosas y demás bebidas. 

Dubbier es un hombre muy organizado aunque ha tenido que enfrentar la competencia comercial del sector.  

La suma de todos sus esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en:
Dubbier, 22 years old, lives in a common-law marriage and is the father of one child. He is characterized as being a very responsible and hard-working man, a visionary and good businessman.

He has always worked as a salesman, selling drinks such as soft drinks in the municipality of Tierra Alta and for 2 years he has had his own business.

He has known how to overcome difficult times in the sales and dreams of purchasing his own house and of having a business that lasts through time. It is for this that Dubbier came to ask for a loan, which he will use to purchase an assorted inventory of liquors, soft drinks, and other drinks.

Dubbier is a very organized man although he has had to confront the commercial competition in the sector.

The sum total of all his efforts offer his family an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase an assorted inventory of liquors, soft drinks and other drinks.

loans.name: Yenifer

texts.es:
Yenifer, en su incansable búsqueda de una mejor vida y una mejor estabilidad económica para su hijo de 2 años, inicio con un negocio de arreglo de uñas y cepillado de cabello prestando su servicio a domicilio en el municipio de Tolu Viejo, un municipio donde el empuje y verraquera es un referente muy importante de los habitantes de esta zona.

Ella trabaja todos los días en horarios muy variados y siempre está ocupada en algún servicio ya que es muy solicitada por su buen trabajo.

Solicita un aliento económico para realizar la compra de planchas para el cabello, secadores y esmaltes de uñas de diferentes colores, así podrá prestar un mejor servicio y podrá mantener a flote su servicio.

Hoy en día se siente feliz por el buen trabajo que hasta ahora ha realizado y que le ha permitido gozar de un trabajo más estable.

Con un prestamo podrás apoyar a Yenifer a continuar con su proyecto de vida!¡
texts.en:
Yenifer, in her tireless search for a better life and better economic stability for her two-year-old child, began with a business doing nails and hair, offering her service at homes in the municipality of Tolu Viejo, a municipality where drive and energy are very important referents for the inhabitants of this zone.

She works every day at a schedule that varies a lot and is always busy in some service since she is sought out a lot for her good work.

She asks for a loan to purchase flat irons for hair, hairdryers, and nail polish in different colors so as to be able to offer better service and be able to keep her business afloat.

These days she is happy for the good work that she has done to date and which has allowed her to enjoy a more stable job.

With a loan, you will be able to support Yenifer in continuing her life project!

loans.use: to purchase flat irons, hair dryers and nail polish in different colors, so to be able to offer better service.

loans.name: Ana Josefa

texts.es: Ana de 31 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras y de granos basicos (arroz, maiz, frijol) se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 3 años e inicio con capital propia gracias a sus ventas es como puede sacar adelante  a sus hijos, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en: Ana, 31 years old, is a single mother and lives in her own house with her three children. She works selling fruits and vegetables and basic grains (rice, corn, beans). She has worked at this job for 3 years and began it with her own capital. Thanks to her sales, she is able to get her children ahead. She is asking for a loan to purchase more products in bulk to continue with her work and, so, to be able to have more income.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables and basic grains (rice, corn, beans) in bulk.

loans.name: Emerita Argentina

texts.es:
La señora Emérita de 66 años de edad es soltera  vive en la ciudad Nacaome Valle, se dedica desde hace 01 año 8 meses  al negocio de videos juegos, en su casa  es una mujer trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante,  y sus clientes son los alumnos del centro educativo y vecinos de la comunidad y agradece a Prisma por dale la oportunidad de tener un crédito.
Está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de 2 Consolas, refrescos, churros, y mas golosinas  para la venta  ya que tiene mucha demanda de estudiantes que visitan el lugar para jugar en los videos juegos.
Su sueño es poder mejorar sus ingresos para tener una mejor vida 

San Lorenzo  Valle Honduras – Septiembre 2015
texts.en:
Emérita, 66 years old, is single and lives in the city of Nacaome Valle. She has worked for 1 year and 8 months at her video game business in her home. She is a hard-working woman with a lot of desire to get ahead and her customers are students at the school and neighbors in the community and she is grateful to Prisma for giving her the opportunity of getting a loan.

She is asking for the loan to purchase 2 consoles, soft drinks, churros and more candies for sale since there is a high demand for them from the students to visit the place to play video games.

Her dream is to be able to improve her income to have a better life.

San Lorenzo Valle Honduras – September 2015

loans.use: to purchase 2 consoles, soft drinks, churros and more candies to sell.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
Rosana es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Sincelejo desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Rosana y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Rosana desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos utensilios de cocina y compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Rosana is a humble and hard-working woman who has dedicated a large part of her life caring for her children. She lives in the municipality of Sincelejo, from where she works spectacularly in the kitchen since she has a business preparing dishes to order such as tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas and more.

She sells these foods primarily to neighbors in the sector who know Rosana's seasoning and know that they will always get delicious and very well-prepared foods.

Rosana wants to increase her sales of food and wants to work more comfortably. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase some kitchen utensils and purchase supplies to continue making her dishes such as chicken, flour, cheese, and more.

This loan will allow her to get her business ahead to get the income necessary which gives her the opportunity to continue supporting her family, the opportunity that Corporación Interactuar offers her.

loans.use: to purchase some kitchen utensils and purchase supplies to continue making her dishes such as chicken, flour, cheese and more.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Это Хосият. Ей 49 лет. Она работает портнихой у себя дома. На протяжении 10 лет Хосият продвигает свою деятельность. У нее есть муж и трое детей. Муж работает водителем. Хосият не имеет высшего образования, и она старается, чтобы ее дети получили. Ее дочка учится в Университете и у нее высокая успеваемость. Но ее обучение является платной и Хосият с мужем не имеют больших денег, чтобы каждый год оплачивать. Хосият не может позволить, чтобы ее дочь бросила Университет, только из-за финансовых издержек. Это и является причиной обращения Хосият за кредитом. Поддержите Хосият и ее дочь.
texts.en:
This is Khosiyat. She is 49 years old, and works from home as a dressmaker. Over the past 10 years, Khosiyat has expanded her work. She has a husband and four children; her husband works as a driver. Khosiyat doesn't have a higher education, but she is trying to make sure her children receive one.

Her daughter studies at university, and is performing very well. However, her studies are fee-paying, and Khosiyat and her husband don't have a lot of money to be able to pay the fees. Khosiyat can't allow her daughter to leave university simply because of the financial cost. This is the reason Khosiyat has applied for a loan. Please support Khosiyat and her daughter.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose es un campesino humilde de 63 años de edad, viene de una familia muy trabajadora que se dedicaba a trabajar el campo para ganarse la vida y gracias a los conocimientos que le transmitieron sus familiares hoy en día se dedica a la cría y comercialización de cerdos. Trabaja desde las primeras horas de la mañana para cuidar y alimentar los animales, los cuales vende por libras o en pie según el requerimiento de sus clientes, que principalmente son propietarios de fincas de la región; de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. 
El titular se caracteriza por ser pujante, activo y trabajador; impulsado por las ganas de seguir progresando, solicita el apoyo de un crédito con el que desea 

Esto le ayudará a aumentar su producción, especialmente para satisfacer la demanda creciente que tiene por la época que se aproxima, en la que sus ventas tienden a incrementar, beneficiando las finanzas familiares. 

Es así como Jose quiere seguir luchando día a día, con empeño y dedicación, pues su ideal es seguir asumiendo la responsabilidad económica de su casa, velar por el bienestar de su esposa y disfrutar junto a ella una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is a humble man from the countryside. He is 63 years old and comes from a very hard-working family who worked in the country to earn a living and, thanks to the knowledge that his family transmitted to him, these days he works raising and selling pigs. He works from the first hours of the day to care for and feed the animals, which he sells by the pound or alive, according to the needs of his customers, who primarily are farm owners in the region. In this way, he earns his living and brings sustenance to his home.

The borrower is characterized as being thriving, active and hard-working, driven by the desire to continue progressing. He asks for the support of a loan which he wants to help him increase his production, specifically to satisfy the growing demand that he has for the upcoming season, in which his sales tend to increase, benefiting the family finances.

This is how Jose wants to continue struggling day by day, with determination and dedication since his ideal is to continue taking on the economic responsibility of his household, keeping watch on his wife's well-being and enjoying a better quality of life with her.

loans.use: to buy small suckling pigs to raise and fatten them up, and to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Juan Esteban

texts.es:
Juan es un microempresario dedicado y trabajador, su campo de acción es la confección, prestando el servicio a terceros.

Todo comenzó hace unos meses cuando trabajaba como operario en un taller de confección; hoy en día, a sus 23 años de edad, ya tiene su propio taller en el que trabaja con su esposa; trabaja todos los días y su fortaleza es la fabricación de camisas; de esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para llevar la carga económica del hogar.

El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de una moto, así podrá transportar su mercancía, insumos y pedidos.
texts.en:
Juan is a dedicated and hard-working micro-entrepreneur. His field of action is sewing, providing his services to third parties.

It all began a few months ago when he worked as an operator in a sewing shop. These days, at 23 years old, he already has his own shop where he works with his wife. He works every day and his strength is making shirts. In this way, he generates sufficient resources to take care of the household economy.

The loan that he requests will be invested in the purchase of a motorcycle to be able to transport his merchandise, supplies and orders.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to offer home delivery service to his customers.

loans.name: Yarley Yohana

texts.es:
Yarley, durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a trabajar como comerciante independiente, desde hace 4 años vio la oportunidad de abrir una tienda en su propia casa, allí ofrece productos de la canasta familiar y poco a poco fue incluyendo nuevos artículos que sus clientes demandaban; esta actividad la desarrolla de manera empírica, trabaja sola y es apasionada por su labor, pues le gusta generar sus propios ingresos, con los cuales puede brindarle a sus hijos una buena educación. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (mecato, galletería, gaseosas, productos de aseo, lácteos, entre otros), así tendrá más variedad de productos disponibles para ofrecer a sus clientes y satisfacer la demanda que aumenta cada día; esto le dará paso a generar mejores utilidades por cada venta y tendrá la oportunidad de seguir avanzando para cumplir el sueño de adquirir un local propio para independizar el negocio de su unidad familiar, pues desea poder generar empleo y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y de las demás personas que influyen en la labor.
texts.en:
Yarley, during her work life has worked as an independent saleswoman. Four years ago, she saw the opportunity to open a store in her home, there she sells family pantry items and little by little she began including new items that her customers wanted. She taught herself the work and works alone and is passionate about her business, since she likes to generate her own income with which she can offer her children a good education.

Currently, she asks for the support of the loan to purchase an assortment in bulk (pastries, cookies, soft drinks, cleaning supplies, dairy products, and more), so to have more variety in the available products to offer her customers and to satisfy the demand that increases each day. This will open the way to generate more profits for each sale and she will have the opportunity to continue advancing to achieve her dream of getting her own sales space to make the business independent from her family, since she wants to be able to create jobs and, so, to improve her family's living conditions and of the people who are influenced by the work.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment in bulk (pastries, cookies, soft drinks, cleaning supplies, dairy products, and more).

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simón con 53 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus tres hijos, en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Simón cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.
