Los sueños de Margarita, son seguir trabajando en lo que le gusta el comercio y sueña con que su hijo estudie una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Margarita is 25 years old, studied until 8th grade, and has a partner who works in agriculture. They have a 6 year old son together.
Margarita has a store in her house which is in a very good location because many people pass by it. Previously, she worked in a store where she was paid for her service and it was there that she got experience and learned how to sell. This is also how she generated enough income to start her own business.
Margarita needs the loan to buy household items like sugar, oil, beans, and corn, among others. The loan will help improve the income of her family and cover the needs of her son.
Margarita's dreams are to keep working in what she likes which is commerce and that her son can obtain a university degree.

loans.use: to buy household items like sugar, oil, beans, and corn, among others.

loans.name: Role Fransisco

texts.es:
El Sr. Role nació en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, tiene 32 años, es casado y tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad que está en el colegio. Actualmente vive en la casa de sus suegros, donde paga los servicios de agua y luz, se dedica al transporte urbano de pasajeros como chofer de taxi, trabaja de lunes a domingo. También realiza arreglo y mantenimiento de movilidades, ya que tiene un certificado a nivel técnico superior en "mecánica automotriz”.
El motivo por el cual solicita el préstamo es para la compra de un vehículo (propio) para el servicio de transporte de pasajeros, y a su vez, poder trasladarse a cualquier lugar y hora, donde algunas personas que requieren de sus servicios como mecánico, puedan beneficiarse del mismo en su momento requerido y de esa manera el Sr. Role pueda generar más ingresos para poder dar a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Role was born in the city of Santa Cruz. He is 32 years old, married, and has a 7-year-old son who is in college. Currently, he lives in his parents-in-law’s house, where he pays the water and electricity utilities. He makes a living in urban passenger transportation as a taxi driver and works Monday through Sunday. He also performs repairs and maintenance on vehicles, since he is certified to the highest technical level in auto mechanics.

He is requesting a loan to purchase a vehicle of his own to provide passenger transportation services, and in turn, be able to travel to any place and at any time, where people who require his mechanic services can benefit from them. In this way, Role will be able to generate more income to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle to provide passenger transportation services in order to generate more income for his family.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: El Sr. Walter de 54 años de edad vive y trabaja actualmente en domicilio y terreno propio, tiene su esposa con la que tienen dos hijos que depende de él los cuales se encuentran estudiando el uno en la universidad y el otro en el nivel secundario, ambos viven en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio muyupampa. La actividad principal del señor Walter es la producción de ají ya que cuenta con capacitación en la fundación Intercultural NOR SUR. Es por eso que requiere el Préstamo que será destinado para la compra  de semilla y agroquímicos y construcción de alambrado, con la compra de la misma empezara su actividad por lo tanto podrá generar nuevos ingresos ya que en la zona se tiene un buen rendimiento de esta actividad por lo tanto podrá generar buenos ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar y su diario vivir con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Walter is 45 years old and currently living and working in his own home and land. He has a wife and two children who depend on him. One is studying at university and the other one in high school. They both live in the department of Chuquisaca, municipality of Muyupampa.

Walter's main work is growing chili. He is already in a training program of the intercultural foundation NOR SUR. This is why he is asking for a loan, which is intended for buying seeds, agricultural chemicals, and for the construction of a wired fence. With this purchase he will begin working and therefore he will be able to generate more income.

There is a high yield in this field of work in this area. Therefore he will be able to generate a good income and improve the living conditions in his home and his daily life with his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural chemicals for his chili production and the construction of wired fences to improve his production and generate a better income for his family.

loans.name: Hannatu

texts.en:
Hannatu is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Hannatu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land (5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer).

Before joining Babban Gona, Hannatu would have had to sell her maize at harvest - a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market - to meet her immediate cash needs for food and clothing. With the help of this loan, Hannatu can store her maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. As a Babban Gona member, Hannatu will benefit from marketing support that could see her generate earnings of up to $2000/ha.

Hannatu is thankful that she now has the opportunity to improve the life of her children and family and looks forward to using her additional earnings to ensure that all her children get a university education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El Sr  Mario es una persona muy luchadora  trabaja a la vez que estudia la carrera de derecho, al terminar su carrera  le gustaría desempeñar en el Área que está estudiando.
Mario pone todo su esfuerzo para poder ser un buen profesional y por medio de sus estudios poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y así poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Mario is hard-working and determined. He is currently working and studying for his law degree at the same time. When he finishes his degree, he would like to work in the field of law.

Mario is working very hard to become a professional business person, and is hoping to improve his living conditions through education.

He is requesting this loan to be able to pay his university fees so that he can continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: El sr. Fernando es una persona de una edad de 25 años, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio de Muyupampa, vive en cuarto alquilado, su actividad del solicitante es el servicio eléctrico el cual prestara servicios a todo tipo de vehículos y motocicletas y a los que necesiten de sus servicios, de las cuales generara sus ingresos para sustentar a su familia, tiene  su esposa y tienen un hijo de 7 años que depende de ellos, mismo que está estudiando en el nivel primario. Con el préstamo que se le otorgara el señor Fernando destinara para la compra de maquinaria y herramienta, por lo cual podrá tener un trabajo y negocio propio y generar un buen ingreso de su actividad y así podrá tener mejores condiciones de vida y poder tener un mejor bien estar y diario vivir con su esposa y su hijo en su hogar.
texts.en:
Fernando is a 25 year old who lives in Muyupampa minicipality, in the department of Chuquisaca. He lives in a rented room. The business of the borrower is an electrical shop where he offers services to all types of vehicles and motorcycles that need his service. He generates income to sustain his family doing this. He has a wife and a 7 year old son who is dependent on them and is studying in primary school.

The loan that has been awarded to Fernando will be used to buy machinery and equipment so that he can have work and his own business to generate good income. Then he can have better living conditions and better well-being and daily life with his wife and son in their home.

loans.use: to buy machinery and equipment to expand and improve his shop, so he can offer better service and generate income for his family.

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
Noel is 45 years old, married and lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. As a microfinance member of Paglaum MPC, he is given priority in financial services to alleviate his present financial conditions. He is provided with the necessary financial literacy and other training in which he actively participates.

Noel has seen the changes in his general living condition from the moment he signed up for membership with the cooperative.

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase materials for boat making such as lumber, plywood, bronze nails, sealant, paint, bamboo, boat engine and fishing nets.

loans.use: to purchase materials for boat making such as lumber, plywood, bronze nails, sealant, paint, bamboo, boat engine and fishing nets

loans.name: Angeles

texts.en:
Retailing helped Angeles' family survive. She retails consumable items and earns a meager income of PHP 6,000 per month. She found the business of buying and selling consumable items easy and simple.

Angeles plans to expand her retailing business. She applied to PMPC for a loan for the needed capital. She wants to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

Angeles smiles at the fact to see all her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

location.town: Sindangan - Dapaon, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the capital she needed to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to her as a small-time borrower. 

Lina was able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic groceries like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Amalia Argentina

texts.es: Amalia, de 21 años de edad, vive sola en el municipio de San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. Ella cuenta con su propia actividad agrícola donde obtiene sus ingresos. Cultiva maíz y frijoles desde hace 2 años en un terreno de sus padres y de la cosecha de maíz además de vender el maíz vende elotes en la misma comunidad. Durante la temporada de cosecha de caña cerca a su comunidad ella trabaja como ayudante de cocina y obtiene otros ingresos. El prestamo que ha solicitado es de 8,000.00 Lempiras para la compra de semilla, abonos y mano de obra para su cultivo de maíz y frijol.  Con ello planea  mejorar sus cosechas y obtener una mayor producción. Con las ganancias obtenidas ella sueña mejorar su vivienda y comprar su propio terreno para cultivar.
texts.en:
Amalia is 21 years old and lives by herself in the municipality of San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. She carries out her own agricultural activities which is how she obtains her income. She's been growing beans and corn for 2 years in a land owned by her parents. From the harvest, in addition to the corn, she also sells corn on the cob in her community.
During the sugar cane harvesting season she works as a kitchen helper in her community and is able to obtain another income.
She's requesting a loan for 8,000.00 Lempiras to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor wages on her bean and corn fields. With it she plans to improve her harvests and get a better outcome. With the profits obtained she dreams of improving her home and buy her own land to cultivate.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and pay for labor wages on her bean and corn fields.

loans.name: Las Magaly 2 Group

texts.en:
Santa Bárbara Suchitepéquez, in the Southwest region of Guatemala, is an area which contributes substantially the global economy as a source of coffee, sugar, rubber, lemons and limes, corn, dairy products, livestock, and a wealth of tropical fruit. Most of the people of the area work in these industries.

In this productive, bustling location, we find “Las Magaly 2” trust bank, a group of seven women named after their neighborhood, who want to potentiate their businesses, commercializing and also gaining more local customers. Their microenterprises include the sale of quality fruits, vegetables, food, ice cream, cosmetics and perfume, and second-hand clothing in spaces they rent out.

In her first loan cycle receiving credit from Kiva lenders, Rosario, the secretary of her trust bank, is 24 years old and mother to a 3-year-old little boy. She had the opportunity to complete her education, graduating with her secondary school degree, and now sells cosmetics and perfumes by catalog, and sometimes sells second-hand clothing.

With the goal to expand her business, Rosario plans to use her loan to supply her business with more cosmetic products and perfumes to sell.

Many thanks to people all over the world who lend to these microenterprises.

loans.use: to supply her business with more cosmetic products and perfumes to sell.

loans.name: Danny Joel

texts.es:
Danny Joel con 39 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa de sus suegros, junto a su cónyuge e hijos, en el distrito de Tumán,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Danny Joel cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Danny Joel se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales(patos,cerdos y carneros) y brinda servicio colectivo como chofer en la Rinconazo-Tumán, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 06 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales para negociar y cubrir otros gastos familiares.Además cancelará saldo de deuda que tiene a nombre de su esposa con COOPAC-TUMÁN. De esta manera ofrecerá una mejor atención con mayor stock de carneros,aves de corral y cerdos.a su vez solucionará problemas de deuda en casa,otorgándole una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Danny Joel es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Danny Joel, 39, is married and lives with his wife and children in his in-law's house in the Tuman district of Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque department of Peru.  Danny Joel has very good work and personal references from people in the area. People here work mainly in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry.

Danny Joel raises and sells animals (ducks, pigs, and sheep), and he also provides transportation services working as a driver on the Rinconazo-Tumán bus route.  He has 6 years of experience in this line of work.  He is requesting a loan to buy animals for his business, and to cover some other family expenses.  He will also pay off some debt in his wife's name that she has with COOPAC-TUMAN.  In this way, he can provide better service by stocking up his livestock business with sheep, barnyard fowl, and pigs.  At the same time, he will solve the problem of his household debt, and will provide his family with a better quality of life.

Danny Joel is a continuing member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy animals for his business and to cover some other expenses for his family

loans.name: Jelly

texts.en:
Jelly is managing her eatery business in Calamba. She mastered the business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. The business has done well supporting the needs of the family. She has local customers and also accepts catering for added income.

Recently, she took a loan to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business. She wants to expand her business and would be more happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more meat and spices for her eatery business.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a hardworking mother who pushes her abilities in venturing into various business activities to provide for the needs of the family. She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC to access its initial capitalization of her convenience store business.

She successfully repaid her loans, and this time is asking for her tenth loan to restock her store with consumable items such as canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk, confections, condiments, bath soaps, detergent bars, and other items.

Elena has high hopes that through Paglaum, she will reach the pinnacle of success that she has been working for.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable items such as canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk, confections, condiments, bath soaps, detergent bars, and other items.

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.es: La Sra. Ermelinda tiene 43 años es de la comunidad de Ancon grande que es una zona productora de uva, la señora tiene 2 hijos, está casada, ella y su esposo tienen sus propias tierras y se dedican a la agricultura por mas de 18 años en casi una hectárea de terreno, ellos producen y venden uva de la variedad la favorita y de la moscatel, provienen de una familia humilde y trabajadora con buenos valores, por razones económicas no pudieron completar sus estudios dedicándose a la agricultura desde muy jóvenes y viven día a día luchando por el sustento y educación de su familia, la Sra Ermelinda necesita el préstamo para la compra de plantines de uva moscatel mismas que le fueron ofrecidas a buen precio, esto será de beneficio ya que lograra incrementar su producción ya que tiene terrenos que aún no están siendo cultivados, para de esa manera poder mejorar sus ingresos y poder ofrecer a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ermelinda is 43 years old and lives in the community of Big Ancon, a region known for its grape production. She's married and with her husband they have their own land, almost an acre, which they've been working on for more than 18 years. They produce and sell grapes from the variety "the favorite" and "moscatel".
They come from a humble and hard working family with good values. They couldn't complete their studies for financial reasons and instead have been working in agriculture since they were very young. They live day to day fighting for their sustenance and the education of their family.
Mrs. Ermelinda needs the loan to buy seedlings of moscatel grapes which were offered to her at a good price. This will benefit her because it will increase her production by making use of land that is not currently being cultivated. In this way they will be able to improve her income and give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seedlings of moscatel grapes to improve her production and sales and generate better income for her family.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es: La Sra. Florentina de 48 años de edad vive y trabaja actualmente en domicilio y terreno propio, tiene su esposo, tienen tres hijos que depende de ellos los cuales se encuentran estudiando el uno en el nivel primario, otro en el nivel secundario y el otro en la universidad, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio Muyupampa. Su principal actividad de la señora es la producción de maní ya que cuenta con capacitación en la fundación Intercultural NOR SUR. Es por eso que requiere el préstamo que será destinado para la compra  de semilla y agroquímicos y construcción de alambrado, con la compra de la misma empezara su actividad por lo tanto podrá generar nuevos ingresos ya que en la zona se tiene un buen rendimiento de esta actividad y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar y su diario vivir con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Florentina is 48 years old. Currently, she lives and works at her house on her own land. She and her husband have three dependent children who are studying: one in the first grade, one in high school, and the other in college. She lives in the Chuquisaca department in the Muyupampa municipality. Her main profession is peanut production, since she has training from the Nor Sur intercultural foundation.

This is why she needs the loan, which will be used to purchase seeds and agricultural chemicals and to build a wire fence. With these purchases, she will start this profession. Since this region provides a good yield in this profession, she will be able to generate more income and improve her living conditions at home and in her daily life with her children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and agricultural chemicals and to build a wire fence to increase her peanut production in order to generate a better income for her family.

loans.name: Glen

texts.en:
Glen is 38 years old. She operates a fishing business together with her husband, who is a fisherman. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the coop offers.

She hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, for which she applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record.

It matters that she has been given a priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what she is thankful for, when all her financing needs for her retailing business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house

loans.name: Jose Segundo

texts.es:
José Segundo con 56 años de edad,de estado civil soltero, vive en casa familiar,en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú, en una zona rural. José Segundo cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

José Segundo se dedica a brindar servicios agrícolas de jornalería, cuenta con más de 10 año de experiencia en el negocio, Solicita préstamo para arreglos de vivienda y para mantenimiento de equipos y herramientas, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio. José Segundo piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los habitantes de la zona.

José Segundo es socio recurrente para Epyme Alternativa. Ha tenido dos créditos de 500,00 y 1000,00 los cuáles han sido cancelados de manera puntual. Desde que se convirtió en cliente de nosotros su negocio ha mejorado y su calidad de vida de igual forma.
texts.en:
José Segundo is 56 years old, single, lives in his family home in a rural area of Oyotun district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque department, Peru. José Segundo has good personal and work references from inhabitants of the area. People in this area primarily work in agriculture, business, and livestock.

José Segundo provides services as a farm laborer. He has more than 10 years experience in this business. He seeks a loan to make home repairs and maintain equipment and tools. The investment will enable him to have better conditioned tools and equipment, which greatly influences his work. José Segundo plans to improve the productivity of his services and thus be able to meet the diverse needs of the inhabitants of the area.

José Segundo is a recurrent member of Epyme Alternativa. He has had two loans of 500,00 and 1000,00 which were repaid punctually. Since he became an Epyme Alternativa client his business and quality of life have improved.

loans.use: to make home repairs and maintain equipment and tools.

loans.name: Norma Abigail

texts.es:
Norma, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y tienen 3 hijos.

Norma, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a criar ganado, su padre le enseño a desempeñar esa actividad y así apoyar a sus hijos, quieren provechar los residuos que genera la agricultura, porque son personas que se dedican bastante a estas actividades.

Norma, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos vacas lecheras, el préstamo le ayudara a mejorar la ganadería, además tendrá mejores ingresos económicos por la venta de leche y de queso que producirán las vacas, esto le servirá para cubrir las necesidades que tienen sus hijos. 

Los sueños de Norma son, convertirse en una persona emprendedora y poner un negocio propio para salir adelante y que sus hijos estudien para que salgan adelante.
texts.en:
Norma is 32 years old and went to school up to sixth grade. She is married and has 3 children, and her husband works in agriculture.

Norma is a homemaker and she also grows livestock, which she learned from her father. With her work she supports her children. Since Norma and her family work in agriculture, they want to use all residue from this activity.

Norma needs the loan to buy two dairy cows. The loan will help her improve her livestock business, which will generate better income due to milk and cheese sales. This will help her satisfy her children's needs.

Norma dreams of becoming an enterprising person, starting her own business to get ahead in life and helping her children study so they can improve their lives.

loans.use: buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
A $600.00 loan is offered to Fatima to improve her business. Fatima lives in Oecusse. Most of her daily income comes from her business, so she is happy to do her business. She started her business in 2010 with her own working capital of $500.00. She will use this loan to buy more detergents, sugar, cooking oils, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, snacks, biscuits, noodles, salt and other things to sell according to what people like, because it has become her activity.

Fatima is happy with this loan that was offered by Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital. And she has a will to manage her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oils, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, snacks, biscuits, noodles, salt and other things to sell.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta has been involved in activities since a few years ago. She started her business with her own working capital.

She is married and is a businesswoman. Her husband is in agriculture, so he is very supportive of her doing business.

Jacinta has a kiosk in her house, but her kiosk is very small. So, now she is requesting a loan of $1,000 because she wants to buy more items according to what people like, such as aqua, sardines, milk, candles, coffee, sugar, gambling cards, candies, noodles, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

She is very hopeful that with this loan, she can improve her management of her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy water, sardines, milk, candles, coffee, sugar, gambling cards, candies, noodles, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 35 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua enteada que vive em sua casa. 
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2010, este é o seu 5º empréstimo com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, varões e mais para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
Futuramente pretende construir casa própria e adquirir uma viatura. O seu maior desafio é dar continuidade com os seus estudos.
texts.en:
Arsenia was born in Namaacha, province of Maputo. She is 35 and a single mother of 2 small children. She is also responsible for her stepdaughter who lives with her. 
She began working with Hluvuku in 2010. This is her 5th loan and she wants to use it to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, rods and other items to continue building her home.
In the future, she intends to finish building her home and buy a car. Her biggest challenge is to continue furthering her education.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, rods and other items to continue building her home.

loans.name: Las Margaritas Group

texts.en:
Santa Clara La Laguna is where eight women between the ages of 30 and 60 have formed the Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Las Margaritas.” Their objective is to break the barriers that have kept them trapped in poverty. Their goals are to sustain and expand their small businesses, educate their children, empower themselves and step into a more prosperous future.

Manuela is a member of the Trust Bank who was only able to attend school for four years. She has five children. Her husband is a farmer whose income just isn’t enough to support the family, so Manuela looked for ways to add income to the family. She hand-embroiders beautiful cloths in a variety of colors and sizes that she offers to her customers.

As the holidays and end of the year activities like graduations are approaching, Manuela is requesting a loan to purchase thread and cloth in various colors for her business.

Manuela and her friends in the Trust Bank look forward to their monthly meetings with a facilitator from Friendship Bridge. In their meetings, they develop camaraderie and self-esteem. Through role playing, games and pictures, the facilitator shares relevant and useful information with the women about hygiene, health care and nutrition ,as well as realizing dreams and setting goals.

Kiva lenders are valued partners with Friendship Bridge in the lives of these women.

loans.use: to purchase thread and cloth in various colors for her textile business.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
Erika continúa con su negocio de venta de comida tradicional (al centro viste blusa a rayas horizontales celeste y negro). El crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó comprando insumos de cocina por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque su negocio trabajo correctamente. Actualmente la banca continúa trabajando con la institución y mejorando sus negocios, “la compra de insumos me ayudó muchísimo, así ya no tengo que hacer compras diarias…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas diarias, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para construir un techo para su negocio. Su sueño es mejorar la atención para que vengan más clientes, ella desea construir un techo para su negocio y comprar sillas. Esta es la 4 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 7 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Erika solicita un préstamo para construir un techo para su negocio y comprar sillas.
texts.en:
Erika continues with her business of selling traditional food (she's to the center and has a blouse with horizontal blue and black stripes). The loan obtained was used to buy cooking supplies at wholesale. Her payments were made on time because her business worked correctly. Currently, the banks keep working with the institution and improving their businesses. "Buying the supplies helped me a lot because I don't have to buy them daily", she mentions.
The advantage of her business is that she makes daily sales. The disadvantage is that she needs money to build a roof for her business. Her dream is to improve her service so that she has more clients so she wants to build a roof and buy chairs.
This is the 4th sequence of loans with the institution in 7 years that it has been carrying out its activities. It's for this reason that Erika is requesting a loan to build a roof and buy chairs.

loans.use: to build a roof for her business and buy chairs.

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta has broad experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities such as growing, caring for plants and harvesting and earning income as well. Marieta has supported her husband by doing this type of work.

Like a farmer caring for her crops, Marieta has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings. Someday, Marieta hopes to purchase another plot of rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en: Melinda always has enthusiasm for farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Sindangan and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work. Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Melinda knows that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season. In the future, Melinda hopes to buy a hauling truck for easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations.

location.town: SINDANGAN-TAMIL, JOSE DALMAN, ZAMBONGA DEL NORTE

loans.name: Jenita

texts.en:
Jenita, 41 years old, is married and has three beautiful children. She has been a wholesaler of bananas in her town for almost ten years. From this long-time experience of selling, she already has high knowledge in running this kind of business. Even though there are many competitors in the town, Jenita still gets more customers than the rest due to her good salesmanship and characteristic effort. She has been successful over the years and manages to save more money for her family.

For now, Jenita is planning to buy a parcel of land in order to manage a new business, creating a small pigpen, for additional income in the near future. To fund this project, she needs additional capital to purchase 100 kilos of bananas for wholesale, so she has requested a loan from Paglaum-MPC.

loans.use: to purchase 100 kilos of bananas for wholesale

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar, de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y vive junto a su esposa y un pequeño nieto, porque su madre falleció y era hija de Oscar, su esposa y su pequeño nieto dependen de el.

Oscar, trabaja en la agricultura desde muy pequeño, esta ha sido su profesión desde siempre, pero aparte de eso también trabaja como albañil y es dueño de dos parcelas y una la tiene cerca a su casa y la otra está un poco más lejos.

Oscar, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizantes, ya que sus cultivos están en etapa de ser abonados y a mejor cuido así sera muy buena su cosecha.

El sueño de Oscar, es obtener muy buenas cosechas y tener excelentes ganancias para que su pequeño nieto estudie y sea profesional.
texts.en:
Oscar, 51 years old, studied until ninth grade. He is married and lives together with his wife and a young grandson because his mother died and was Oscar's daughter. His wife and young grandson depend on him.

Oscar has worked in agriculture since he was very young. This has always been his profession, but apart from that he also works as a builder and is the owner of two plots and one is near his house and the other is a little further away.

Oscar needs the loan to buy manure and fertilizer, since his crops are in the fertilizing period and with better care it will be a very good harvest.

Oscar's dream is to obtain very good harvests and to have excellent earnings so that his young grandson can study and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, de 66 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está acompañado desde hace 7 años y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y juntos tienen una hija que esta pequeña.

Julio, se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde que era joven un tío le enseño a pescar y a ganarse la vida de esa forma, decidió dedicarse a esta actividad porque no encontró otra forma de ayudar a su familia.- Pero aparte de eso también es electricista y actualmente trabaja a 4 kilómetros de su casa y este trabajo lo realiza por las noches y su horario es de aproximado 8 horas.

Julio, necesita el préstamo para comprar otra red de pesca de 5 metros de largo y comprar dos paletas de remo para movilizarse y hacer su trabajo; con este préstamo su necesidad será satisfacer y tendrá las herramientas necesarias para hacer lo que le gusta. 

Los sueños de Julio, son colocar su propio negocio de venta de pescado y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Julio, 66 years old, went to school until eighth grade. He has been cohabitating for seven years with his partner, who works as a housekeeper, and together they have a daughter who is little.

Julio has worked as an artisan fisher since he was young. An uncle taught him how to fish and make a living this way. He decided to dedicate himself to this activity because he didn't find another way to help his family, but apart from that he is also an electrician and actually works four kilometers from his house and this job is something he does at night. His schedule is approximately eight hours.

Julio needs the loan to buy another fishing net, five meters long, and to buy two oars to get out and do his job. With this loan, his need will be satisfied and he will have the tools necessary to do what he likes.

Julio's dreams are to start his own business selling fish and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy another five-meter-long fishing net and to buy two oars to get out and do his job.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna, de 41 años de edad, es una madre de 4 hijos, vive junto con su esposo y 3 hijos en una colonia que pertenece al Municipio de Tocoa Colon. Tiene su propio negocio de una pequeña pulpería donde ofrece productos enlatados, de limpieza, refrescos, golosinas y granos básicos como arroz y frijoles y otros abarrotes. Este negocio lleva 2 años y cuenta con  otra fuente de ingresos que es la venta de comidas. El prestamo que solicita es por la cantidad de 5,000.00 Lempiras para la compra de más granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, azúcar, aceite, verduras, condimentos, etc. para incrementar su inventario con nuevos productos. Su meta es mejorar la imagen de su pulpería ofreciendo servicios de calidad a sus clientes y con el tiempo convertir su negocio en mini-súper para obtener más ingresos y ayudar a  graduar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Reyna is 41 years old and the mother of 4 children. She lives with her husband and 3 of her children in a neighborhood of the town of Tocoa Colon. She has her own business which is a small grocery store where she sells canned goods, cleaning supplies, soft drinks, sweets, and basic grains such as rice and beans, as well as other groceries. She's had her business for the last 2 years, and she also sells food as an alternate source of income.

Reyna is requesting a loan of 5,000.00 Lempiras to buy more basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sugar, oil, vegetables, condiments, etc. to increase her inventory with new products.

Her goal is to improve the image of her store offering her clients good-quality products and, in time, see her business grow to become a mini-market in order to generate more income and help her children graduate.

loans.use: buy more basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sugar, oil, vegetables, condiments, etc. to increase her inventory with new products.

loans.name: Helena

texts.pt:
A Senhora Helena é  viuva, ela vive na casa propria com sua filha mais nova e um neto. Ela é trabalhadora e com o presente emprestimo pretende adquirir material de construção para dar continuidade com a sua obra nomeadamente: cimento, chapas, barrote e pranchas.
O seu maior sonho é concluir a obra iniciada pelo esposo. Ela tem como desafio educar, formar e cuidar da sua filha mais nova.
texts.en:
Helena is a widow. She lives in a house that she owns with her youngest daughter and a grandson. She is hardworking and she wants to use this loan to buy construction materials to continue the works such as cement, metal sheets, rods and planks.
Her biggest dream is to finish the works started by her husband. Her goals are to take care of her youngest daughter and provide her with an education.

loans.use: to buy cement, metal sheets, rods and planks.

loans.name: Felizarda

texts.pt:
A Senhora Felizarda é viuva, vive na casa propria com os seus três filhos, todos eles maiores de idade e quatro netos. 
Ela é trabalhadora e para melhorar o seu rendimento vende capulanas por conta propria, com o presente emprestimo vai comprar onze peças de  capulana para revender.
O seu maior sonho é ver os seus filhos formados e a trabalhar porque ela é a unica que sustenta toda a familia. 
Tem dificuldade financeira para sustenter a familia e ampliar a casa que é muito pequena ( tipo1) enquanto a familia é maior.
texts.en:
Felizarda is a widow. She lives in a house that she owns with her three children, all under age and four grandchildren.
She is hardworking and to increase her income she sells capulanas on her own. She wants to use this loan to buy eleven pieces of capulana fabric to resell.
Her biggest dream is to see her children become educated and able to work, because she is the only one who supports the family at the moment. 
She struggles financially to support the family and expand her small single-bedroom home too crowded for them.

loans.use: to buy eleven pieces of capulana fabrics to resell

loans.name: Kantutas Group

texts.es:
Marisol continúa con su negocio de  venta de cosméticos por catálogo (sentada en la silla). El crédito que obtuvo lo utilizó comprando cosméticos por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque sus clientes le pagaron con normalidad. Actualmente la banca sigue trabajando con la institución, su negocio se estabiliza y lo clientes están creciendo, “pude comprar mercadería y venderla a crédito, los clientes me pagaron bien…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que vende a crédito, la desventaja es la falta efectivo para mantener funcionando el negocio. Su sueño es ampliar su negocio, comprar vitrinas y mejorar la atención al cliente, ella desea comprar cosméticos por mayor para continuar con su negocio. Esta es la 14 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 11 años que desarrolla esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Marisol solicita un préstamo para comprar cosméticos por mayor para vender a crédito y continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Marisol continues her business selling cosmetics by catalog (seated in the chair). She used the loan she obtained to buy wholesale cosmetics, and payment of her fees was punctual because her customers pay her on a normal basis. Presently, the bank continues working with the institution, her business is stabilizing, and the customers are increasing.

"I could buy merchandise and sell it on credit, the customers paid me well..." she comments.

The advantage of her business is that she sells on credit. The disadvantage is the lack of cash to keep her business functioning. Her dream is to grow her business, buy display cabinets, and improve client attention. She wishes to buy wholesale cosmetics to continue with her business.

This is the 14th sequence of loans with the institution in 11 years that she developed this activity. It is for those reasons that Marisol requests a loan to buy wholesale cosmetics to sell on credit and continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy wholesale cosmetics to sell on credit and to continue with her business.

loans.name: Manuel Eduardo

texts.es:
Manuel Eduardo con 29 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su cónyuge,padre e hijo, en el distrito de Pucará,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Manuel Eduardo cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto laborales como personales.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Manuel Eduardo se dedica a la venta de pollos de granja, así como también de aves de corral, sus ventas lo hace en restaurantes, cuenta con 04 años de experiencia en esta actividad. Adicionalmente se dedica a ser peón agrícola, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.Para este rubro no hay mayor competencia en la zona y con ello obtiene mejores precios.Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales y así mismo para realizar arreglos en sus corrales.

Manuel Eduardo es socio recurrente, firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Manuel Eduardo, 29 years old and in a common-law marriage, lives in a rustic material house of his own together with his partner, father, and son in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén, department of Cajamarca, country of Peru. Manuel Eduardo has very good work as well as personal references. The inhabitants of this town work mostly in agriculture, trade, and stockbreeding.

Manuel Eduardo makes a living selling farm chickens as well as poultry. He makes his sales in restaurants; he has 4 years of experience in this occupation. Additionally, he works as a farm laborer. With it, he will generate higher income and thus be able to improve his quality of life. For this line of work, there is no greater competition in the area and with it, he gets better prices.

Manuel Eduardo is requesting a loan for the purchase of a greater quantity of animals and likewise to make repairs to his pens. He is a recurrent borrower; he is signing with his partner.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals and to make repairs to his pens.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina has been involved in business for a few years. She has a shop of clothes in the market. Paulina earns a good income every day because she sells in the center of the market so many people are interested in her clothes, She is very happy to do her business.

Paulina is applying for a loan of $600 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She is taking this loan because she wants to buy more clothes such as long skirts, women's and men's shirts, turtleneck shirts, undershirts, ties, trousers and other items. And with the loan from Tuba Rai Metin, she hopes to get good management for her business. Paulina also has animals, such as pigs and chickens.

loans.use: to buy long skirts, women's and men's shirts, turtleneck shirts, undershirts, ties, trousers and other items.

loans.name: Yenis Maricela

texts.es:
Yenis, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, está casada y vive junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijas, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura mientras y sus hijas estudian.
		
Yenis, posee una pequeña tienda desde hace dos años que fue heredada por su madre, ella abre su negocio todos los días de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. ella también se dedica a la venta de panes con pollo los fines de semana.

Yenis, necesita el dinero para construir un cafetín en donde venderá comida rápida, porque se encuentra en una buena ubicación y tiene una excelente clientela la cual le genera muy buenas ganancias.

Ella sueña con tener su cafetin, el cual siempre a sido uno de sus mayores objetivos y de esa manera seguir dándole una buena educación a sus hijas para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Yenis is 28 years old, studied until 7th grade, is married, and lives with her husband and 3 daughters. Her husband works in agriculture and their daughters attend school. Yenis has had a small store for 2 years which she inherited from her mother. She opens her business daily from 6AM to 6PM. She also sells chicken sandwiches on the weekends.
Yenis needs the money to build a small cafe where she will sell fast food because she is in a good location and has an excellent clientele which allows her to generate a very good profit.
She dreams of having her cafe which has always been one of her major goals and in that way be able to continue giving her daughters a good education so they can become professionals.

loans.use: to build a small cafe where she will sell fast food.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.es:
Jacqueline con 31 años de edad,de estado civil soltera,vive junto a sus padres, en el distrito de Lagunas,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú,en una zona urbana. Jacqueline cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Jacqueline se dedica a la actividad de crianza de ganado vacuno y venta de leche,con una experiencia en el rubro de más de 02 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de animales y alimento para los mismos.De esta manera hacer crecer su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Jacqueline es socio nuevo Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is 31 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the district of Lagunas, province of Chiclayo, department of Lambayeque in Peru in an urban zone. Jacqueline has very good personal and work related references from her neighbors.
Jacqueline works breeding beef cattle and sells milk. She has been working in this area for more than 2 years. She's requesting a loan to buy more animals and feed for them. In this way she will grow her business and improve her quality of life. She's a new member of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy more animals and feed for them.

loans.name: Maria Emelda

texts.es: María, de 30 años de edad, vive con su esposo en una de las colonias cercanas a Cofradía, Cortes en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Ella cuenta con su propia pulpería donde ofrece productos  de la canasta básica como ser: Maíz, Arroz, Frijoles, Refrescos, Churros, Pan, Lácteos, Harina, verduras frutas huevos, condimentos y recargas electrónicas de saldos para celulares.  Antes de eso se dedicada a empleo asalariado en una maquila. Pero la opción de tener negocio la ayudo mucho. Ella solicita el segundo préstamo a la institución que es por la cantidad de 15,000.00 Lempiras, el cual va invertir en la compra de mas productos como granos básicos, lácteos, productos de limpieza, azúcar, manteca, refrescos, verduras, huevos, churros y saldos prepagos para celulares y aumentar su cantidad de inventario, clientes y obtener mayores ingresos. Su plan a futuro es comprar su propia vivienda para apoyar en la mejora del bienestar familiar y apoyar en sentido económico a su esposo.
texts.en:
María, 30 years old, lives with her husband in a neighborhood close to Cofradía, Cortes, in the San Pedro Sula municipality. She has her own convenience store, where she offers basic products such as corn, rice, beans, sodas, chips, bread, milk products, flour, vegetables, fruit, eggs, condiments and prepaid cell phone service cards. Before that, she made a living as a salaried employee in a maquiladora (an assembly factory), but the option of having a business helped her a lot.

She is requesting her second loan from this institution, with an amount of 15,000 Honduran Lemprias, which she will invest in the purchase of more products such as staple grains, milk products, cleaning products, sugar, lard, sodas, chips and prepaid cell phone service cards. This will increase her inventory and her clients, allowing her to earn a better income. Her future plan is to purchase her own house to improve her family’s well being and to support her husband economically.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, milk products, cleaning products, sugar, lard, sodas, chips and prepaid cell phone service cards.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
Rubén, de 70 años de edad, vive solo, es reconocida en su comunidad como un gran líder, es agricultor y estudio hasta cuarto grado, dejo sus estudios por motivos económicos y se dedico a la agricultura para poder ayudar a su familia.

Rubén, trabaja desde hace 55 años en la agricultura, sus cultivos los realiza en una parcela que está cerca de su casa, además de su labor es un líder de su comunidad, el cual ayuda a promover proyectos que beneficien su cantón.

Rubén, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono para sus cultivos, porque con un buen cuido sacara excelentes cosechas y con el préstamo podrá lograr lo que desea.


El sueño de Rubén, es poder alcanzar buenas cosechas de las cuales espera generar buenas ganancias y de igual manera anhela que en su comunidad se ejecuten proyectos sociales para el bien de los habitantes.
texts.en:
Rubén is 70 years old. He lives alone and is known in his community as a great leader. He is a farmer and went to school up to the fourth grade. He stopped going to school due to financial reasons and started working in farming to help his family.

Rubén has worked for the last 55 years in agriculture. He grows his crops on a land parcel that is close to his home. In addition to his work, he is a leader in his community, which helps him promote projects that benefit his canton.

Rubén needs the loan to buy fertilizer for his crops, because with good care he will get excellent harvests and with the loan he will achieve what he wants.

Rubén's dream is to attain good harvests from which he hopes to generate good profits. He also wishes for social projects to be done in his community for the good of the residents.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is requesting a loan of $1000.00 to improve his business. Most of his daily income is from selling meatballs because he earns a good income from this business. He lives near many people and every day they come to buy his meatballs to eat, so he still happy to do this business.

David has been involved in business activities since a few years ago, when he started with his own working capital. When Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan for his business, he said that with this loan he will improve his management of his business to run a bigger business in the future. The person who sits behind David's food cart is his father.

He will use this loan to buy more materials like vegetables, noodles, spices, meat, ketchup, sauces and other things to use.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, noodles, spices, meat, ketchup, sauces and other things to use.

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Helena built her house a few years ago, with her own working capital, and her house was completed a few years ago. But now her house has been broken, so now she has a plan to rehabilitate her house. But she does not have enough money to buy more materials to rehabilitate her house.

So now she is requesting a loan of $ 1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to add to her capital, and then she and her husband will use this loan to buy materials like sand, cement, iron, nails, wood, glass and other materials to use.

Helena is happy because Tuba Rai Metin can help her to do the rehabilitation of her house. She also raises animals like dogs, pigs and goats.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, iron, nails, wood, glass and other materials to use.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda, 57 years old, earns a livelihood by operating a " tricycle" (rickshaw) service. For the past seven years, she has been engaged as a tricycle operator, serving locals in her area. Linda is married and has five grown children. She resides in the rural town of Loon, Bohol.

Linda needs funds to boost and maintain the safety of her vehicle. She decided to take out a loan to buy motor parts such as tires and to pay for maintenance. This would enable her to provide safe and sound trips to her passengers and attract them to become regular passengers. An increase in passengers would allow Linda to start saving half of the profit for expansion. In that way, she could start to invest and manage her income properly. In the future, Linda is determined to seek ways to become more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy motor parts such as tires and to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Fausto

texts.pt:
O Senhor Fausto vive na casa própria com a sua esposa tem dois filhos menores do primeiro casamento e os mesmos vivem com os avós. Ele é segurança e avicultor, com o presente empréstimo ele pretende comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para produzir frangos de abate.
O seu sonho é ter os filhos a viverem perto dele, tem algumas pois tem dificuldades em fazer o acopanhamento do crescimento dos mesmos devido a distância.
texts.en:
Fausto lives in a house that he owns with his wife. He has two under-age children from his previous marriage who live with their grandparents. He is a security guard and a chicken farmer. He wants to use this loan to buy chicks, feed and vitamins to produce chicken for slaughter.
His dream is to live with his children again. He is still in their lives, but it's hard to be involved in their upbringing when they live far away from him.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, vitamins to produce chicken for slaughter.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla, estudio hasta octavo grado, lamentablemente no pudo continuar con sus estudios, está acompañada y tiene dos hijos y su hijo mayor trabaja junto a su padre en la pesca artesanal.

Karla, posee un puesto de tortillas, porque una amiga le dejo el local para que ella vendiera tortillas y desde hace un año trabaja de lunes a sábado y viaja 15 minutos en bus todos los días para poder laborar en su negocio.

Karla, necesita el préstamo para comprar lámina para arreglar el lugar donde vende porque esta en mal estado y para comprar maíz para guardarlo y no comprarlo caro cuando suba el precio, ella espera que esto ayude a mejorar las ganancias de su negocio.

Karla, sueña con que su pequeño hijo continué estudiando y pueda superarse académicamente y desea poner otro puesto de venta de tortillas para que lo administre su hermana.
texts.en:
Karla went to school up to the eighth grade. Unfortunately she was not able to continue with her education. She is partnered and has two children and her older son works with his father at traditional fishing.

Karla has a tortilla stand because a friend left her the space so that she can sell tortillas and for a year she has worked from Monday to Saturday and travels 15 minutes by bus every day to be able to work at her business.

Karla needs the loan to purchase metal sheeting to fix up the sales location because it is in bad condition, and to purchase corn to store it and not purchase it expensively when the price goes up. She expects that this will help to increase the earnings of her business.

Karla dreams of her little son continuing his education and being able to improve himself academically and she wants to establish another tortilla stand for her sister to run.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting to fix up her sales place because it is in bad condition, and to purchase corn.

loans.name: José Isabel

texts.es:
José, de 59 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, pero fue beneficiado con el programa de alfabetización del MINED con el cual culmino con su educación básica, vive solo, porque su familia está lejos por motivos personales.

José, trabaja en la agricultura desde su infancia, su padre le enseño a temprana edad la siembra de granos básicos, pero su pasión es el cultivo de maíz y tiene una parcela a 6 kilómetros de su casa.

José, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono e insecticidas para las plagas, porque no cuenta con el dinero necesario para abonar y obtener una buena cosecha.

El sueño de José, es obtener una buena cosecha y que su hijo lo perdone y que regrese a casa porque él está muy triste.
texts.en:
Jose is 59 years old, studied until 3rd grade but was benefited by the alphabetization program from the Ministry of Education through which he was able to complete a basic education. He lives alone because his family lives far away for personal reasons.
Jose has been working in agriculture since he was a young child. His father taught him at a young age to grow basic grains but his passion is growing corn and he owns some land 6 kilometers away from his home.
Jose needs a loan to buy fertilizer and insecticides because he doesn't have the money to fertilize his land and obtain a good harvest. Jose's dream is to obtain a good harvest and that his son forgives him and returns home because he is very sad.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticides

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: El Sr. Ángel de 52 años de edad vive y trabaja actualmente en domicilio y terreno propio, tiene su esposa con cual tienen dos hijos que depende de ellos los cuales se encuentran estudiando el uno en el nivel primario y el otro en el nivel secundario, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio Muyupampa. Su principal actividad del solicitante es la producción de ají ya que cuenta con capacitación en la fundación Intercultural NOR SUD. Es por eso que requiere el préstamo que será destinado para la compra  de semilla y agroquímicos y construcción de alambrado, con la compra de la misma empezara su actividad por lo tanto podrá generar nuevos ingresos ya que en la zona se tiene un buen rendimiento de esta actividad por lo tanto podrá generar buenos ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar y su diario vivir con sus hijos.
texts.en: Angel is 52 years old.  Currently, he lives and works from his home on his own land.  He and his wife have two dependent children who are studying, one in elementary school and the other in high school.  He lives in the Chuquisaca department in the Muyupampa municipality.  His main profession is pepper production, since he has training from the Nor Sud intercultural foundation.  This is why he needs the loan, which will be used to purchase seeds and agricultural chemicals and to build a wire fence.  With these purchases, he will start his profession.  Since this region provides a good yield in this profession, he will be able to generate more income and improve his living conditions at home and in his daily life with his children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and agricultural chemicals to increase his pepper production, to provide the public with better offers, and generate resources for his family.

loans.name: Maria Jesus

texts.es:
María Jesús con 36 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive en casa propia, en el distrito de Oyotún,provincia de Chiclayo,país Perú, una zona rural. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

María Jesús se dedica a brindar servicios de profesora a niños particulares que requieran sus servicios,con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 02 años.Solicita préstamo para la compra de activo fijo; compra de una computadora de escritorio y además accesorios para su implementación de su local en donde brinda sus servicios, para que así de un buen servicio a sus alumnos.

María Jesús es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
María Jesús is 36 years old. She is single and lives in her own home in the district of Oyotún,province of Chiclayo, Peru, in a rural area. The residents of this locality mostly work in agriculture, trade and ranching.

María Jesús offers private teaching services to children who require her services. She has 2 years' experience in the area. She is asking for the loan to buy a fixed asset, a desktop computer and accessories to out fit the locale where she offers her services. This way, she can offer a good service to her students.

María Jesús is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy a fixed, a desktop computer and accessories to outfit her locale where she offers her services.

loans.name: Yeser  Suriel

texts.es: Yeser, tiene 31 años de edad, esta soltero, tiene un hijo y reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Yeser alquila un local desde hace dos años donde tiene instalado su propio negocio de venta y reparación de teléfonos celulares de varios tipos. Para él esta actividad es su fuente de ingresos y ha decidido invertir mas para ampliar el inventario y aumentar las ventas. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 25,000 Lempiras para comprar mas celulares y accesorios y repuestos para venta y reparación de los mismos. En un futuro su sueño es lograr tener un propio local para su negocio y tener un negocio mas grande.
texts.en:
Yeser, 31 years old, is single, has a child, and lives in a small town in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. Yeser rents a store where for the past two years ago he's had his own business selling and repairing various types of cell phones.

For him, this work is his source of income and he has decided to invest more in order to grow the inventory and increase sales. The loan he is requesting is the second cycle, and is for 25,000 Lempiras to buy more cell phones and accessories and the parts to sell and repair them.

In the future, his dream is to be able to have his own store for his business and to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy cell phones, accessories, and spare parts for repair and sale.

loans.name: Reinaldo

texts.es:
Reinaldo continua arduamente con sus estudios de licenciatura en agropecuaria, comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior pudo pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda para poder continuar con sus sueños de ser un profesional exitoso.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente la cuota de sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Reinaldo continues to study arduously for his degree in agriculture. He remarks that with the previous loan, he was able to pay for his university tuition. This was a big help for him to continue with his dream of becoming a successful professional.

He is asking for this new loan to be able to pay for his tuition again so that he may continue with his education, as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Julio Gianmarco

texts.es:
Julio Gianmarco con 20 años de edad,de estado civil soltero,vive junto a sus padres, en el distrito de Zaña,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en la mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Julio Gianmarco se dedica a la actividad de servicio de transporte en mototaxi en Zaña,Cayaltí y anexos, desde hace más de 02 años de experiencia en el rubro.solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento y reparación de su mototaxi. De esta manera hará crecer su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Julio Gianmarco es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.SU último crédito fué de S/ 1,700.00 el cuál lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Julio Gianmarco is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the district of Zaña, province of Chiclayo, department of Lambayeque in Peru. The settlers in the area mostly work in agriculture, commerce, and cattle raising.
Julio Gianmarco has been working the transportation business with his auto-rickshaw in Zaña, Cayaltí, and other areas for more than 2 years. He's requesting the loan for the maintenance and repair of his auto-rickshaw. In this way he'll be able to grow his business and improve his quality of life.
Julio Gianmarco is a recurring member of Edpyme Alternativa. His last credit was for S/ 1,700.00 which he repaid in a timely manner.

loans.use: for the maintenance and repair of his auto-rickshaw.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y vive con su esposa y su hija la cual estudia noveno grado; mientras que su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Luis, trabaja en la agricultura desde muy joven, comenzó a trabajar para poder cubrir las necesidades básicas de su 
familia, también trabaja como albañil en temporadas de invierno en las parcelas que tiene a 5 kilómetros aproximadamente de su casa, en la cual trabaja todos los días.

Luis, necesita el crédito para comprar abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, porque es el momento para abonar y para comprar los suministros agrícolas, ya que con un buen cuido podrá obtener una buena cosecha.

Luis, sueña con obtener buenas cosechas y que su hija pueda culminar sus estudios con éxitos y se profesional.
texts.en:
Luis, 37 years old, went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and lives with his wife and daughter who is in ninth grade, while his wife takes care of the domestic tasks.

Luis has worked in agriculture since he was very young. He began to work to be able to pay for the basic needs of his family and he also works as a bricklayer in the winter season. On the land that he has approximately 5 kilometers from his house, he works every day.

Luis needs the loan to purchase manure and fertilizers for his crops because it is time to fertilize and to purchase agricultural supplies since with good care he will be able to get a good harvest.

Luis dreams of getting good harvests and that his daughter can complete her education successfully and be a professional.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Dolores Isabel

texts.es:
Dolores, de 47 años de edad, es una madre soltera con 3 hijos, reside con ellos en el municipio de Cofradía, Cortes. Anteriormente ella trabajaba como operaria en una maquila pero desde hace 10 años cambio a su propio negocio, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de piñatas de diferentes estilos. Este negocio le ha permitido sacar  
Adelante a su familia y cuidar su bienestar. Ella solicita la cantidad de 10,000.00 Lempiras que invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de mas piñatas como ser el alambre, papel china, pegamento y otro. Ella sueña en crecer con su negocio de esta forma ella podrá cumplir sus sueño de terminar de construir el muro de su casa y también sueña en tener un local propio para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
Dolores, 47 years old, is a single mother with 3 children. She lives with them in the municipality of Cofradía, Cortes. Previously, she worked as an operator at a factory but 10 years ago she switched to having her own business. She works making and selling piñatas in different styles. This business has allowed her to get her family ahead and take care of their well-being.

She asks for the amount of 10,000.00 lempiras which she will invest in the purchase of materials to make more piñatas such as the wire, tissue paper, adhesive and more. She dreams of growing with her business and in this way she will be able to achieve her dream of finishing building the wall around her house and also she dreams of having her own retail space to sell her products.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wire, tissue paper, adhesive and others to make more piñatas.

loans.name: Abraham Isai

texts.es:
Abraham, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, está casado y vive con su esposa con quien tiene una bebe y también vive con sus padres, los cuales ya no trabajan por su edad y dependen de él.

Abraham, trabaja en la agricultura desde pequeño, aprendió a sembrar granos básicos gracias a su padre, quien fue él que le enseño todo lo que sabe, el posee una parcela cerca de su casa en donde trabaja todos los días.

Abraham, necesita el préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizantes para darle mantenimiento a sus cultivos y para obtener una buena cosecha de granos básicos.

El sueño de Abraham, es obtener buenas cosechas porque de eso depende el sustento de su familia y también sueña con darle un mejor futuro a su hija.
texts.en:
Abraham, 33 years old, studied until the 1st grade.  He is married and lives with his wife with whom he has a baby girl.  He also lives with his parents; they do not work due to their age, and they depend on him.

Abraham has worked in agriculture since he was little.  He learned to plant basic grains thanks to his father.  It was he who taught him everything that he knows.  He has a parcel of land that is close to his house where he works everyday.

Abraham needs the loan to buy manure and fertilizers to give maintenance to his crops and to obtain a better crop of basic grains. 

Abraham's dream is to have better crops because his family depends on it, and he also dreams of giving a better future to his daughter.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers to give maintenance to his crops.

loans.name: Ana Gabriela

texts.es: Ana, de 25 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempiras con su hijo y 3 de sus hermanos. Hace 4 años que ofrece desde su casa los servicios de venta de comidas: desayunos, almuerzo y cenas en donde ofrece productos como ser: tacos, baleadas, pupusas, golosinas y mas, lo cual ha visto que ha resultado bien como fuente de ingresos. Ella solicita la cantidad de 15,000.00 Lempiras para invertirlos en la compra de carnes, verduras, productos de la canasta básica y el pago de los trabajadores de su comedor. Esta inversión le ayudará de mucho ya que planea trasferir su negocio a un local más amplio y de esa forma atraer más cliente al igual que ofrecer una mayor cantidad de platos variados para el consumo de sus clientes. Lo cual le permitirá sacar adelante a su hijo y darle una mejor condición de vida, así como apoyar el núcleo familiar y salir adelante con el resto de sus hermanos.
texts.en:
Ana is 25 years old. She is a single mother and lives in the town of Gracias, Lempiras with her son and 3 of her siblings. For the last 4 years she has been selling food from her house: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Her menu includes tacos, baleadas (flour tortilla folded in half with refried beans, cheese, cream, and other ingredients inside), pupusas (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans), sweets and more. She has received very good earnings with these foods.

Ana is requesting a loan of 15,000.00 Lempiras to buy meat, vegetables, basic needs products and to pay the workers of her eatery. This investment will help her a lot because she has plans of moving her business to a bigger local. This way she will be able to attract more clients and to offer them a greater variety of dishes.

This will allow her to help her son giving him a better education and quality of life, as well as support her family and improve her life along with the rest of her siblings.

loans.use: buy meat, vegetables and basic needs products, and pay the workers of her eatery.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.en:
Albertina is a businesswomen who has a kiosk, so now she is requesting a loan of $1,000.00 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. Albertina started her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $500.00.

She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as detergents, sugar, snacks, cooking oils, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sardines, biscuits, noodles, lighters, close up, eggs, candy, catsup, soft drinks, and other things to sell.

She is happy with the loan that Tuba Rai Metin offered to her, to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she hopes with this loan she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy some detergents, sugar, snacks, cooking oils, slippers, cigarettes, coffee, sardines, biscuits, noodles, lighters, close up, eggs, candy, catsup, and soft drinks.
